The two men aren't talking during the short voyage to Solva's yacht at the marina, where the man steps out of the car, and Jack drives away.Solva receives Professor Yura on the deck, still in her swimsuit. The scientist has overcome some difficulties, and has completed the chemical formula, and Solva tells him that she has a fully equipped laboratory for him to work in. He needs ten days to get ready what she ordered, and Solva is satisfied with the timing, for a commando attack to destroy the oil refineries of Salinas, Ecuador.(04:10) GUAYAQUIL, ECUADORAerial shot of Guayaquil, Ecuador. A sexy blonde in a white bikini is target shooting at a mansion with swimming pool. She is contacted by radio, to go see her contact aboard another yacht. A man hands her an address: she shall take care of Dinamo, and take a man with her whom she will meet the next day at sunrise, at Punta Carnero.As scheduled, she meets with the man, and takes the driver's seat of a red convertible. She is the S.O.S. Agent in Ecuador, and explains to him that the organization is about to recoup it's investment of five years by destroying the larger oil refineries of the country. With a loss of 30 million gallons per month, all means of transport will stop, and that will cause the collapse of the national economy. The man concludes saying that it will give the opportunity for S.O.S. to dictate the conditions not to repeat the action in other countries.(06:20) At the cocktail lounge Huancavilca, Alex Dinamo, the International Service secret agent [Alex Cristal in the Italian dubbed version], divides his attention between Samantha the Belly Dancer, and a table where the sultry S.O.S. Agent in Ecuador and her partner are sitting.A female photographer takes a photo of him, but she is intercepted at the bar by a lady in a red dress who bluntly takes the negative from her camera - unopposed.Alex goes to the bar and gives a rendez-vous to the woman in red in two hours. She tells him, «Yes, love,» and warns him that the other girl is pretty and may be dangerous. Alex makes a joke at the Police Inspector that was also standing at the bar, after catching a casino chip that he tossed up in the air. It is implied that the woman in red is redheaded Maura, Alex Dinamo's assistant.Alex pays a visit to Samantha's dressing room, and tells her that her next contact will be Barbara - but they are being listened by the S.O.S. agents in a room next to Samantha's. The female S.O.S. Agent in Ecuador decides "to take care of Barbara", and instructs her partner to dispose of Alex and Samantha.Samantha delays Alex in her room, hugging him seductively in her white negligee. Through a moving partition on the wall, the S.O.S. henchman shoots - but Alex turns around instinctively, and it's Samantha who takes the fatal shot in the back.
The gunman attempts to shoot the agent, but is killed by a shot from a special gun hidden in his left sleeve. The secret agent quickly finds the hidden microphone, and is worried that S.O.S. has heard the name of the other International Service agent.(09:00) The S.O.S. Agent in Ecuador, wearing a dark blue figure-hugging mini-dress, drives the red car to Barbara's house, where the young woman is finishing her shower. She finds the door open, descends the stairs to the lower ground, and takes a small pistol from her garter belt. She sneaks in to surprise her.Barbara was quick dressing up in a simple, colored frock, and happens to see the S.O.S. woman's silhouette through a curtain, and waits for her behind the bedroom door. She disarms the attacker with a kick, and they trade karate chops. Barbara goes down, showing her legs, and adroitly repelling another attack with a two-legged kick to the S.O.S. agent's chest. The S.O.S. agent was about to kick her head, but Barbara was quick in picking up the discarded gun and she shoots her in the chest, killing her.(10:20) Aboard a submarine, the S.O.S. Commando Leader in Ecuador is showing a map to his subordinates, and giving the last instructions. It will be a quick operation, with four teams placing the explosives on the petrol deposits. All is set to "zero-six-hours".(11:20) Barbara calls Alex Dinamo at his hotel, but the call is taken by Maura instead.
Barbara gives her a rendez-vous point at "KH" - but the phone conversation has been recorded by the telephone operator, who passes the information on to the S.O.S..Barbara enters a O.S.S. ship, and shoots dead the radio operator who had just been handed the documents with the sabotage plan. Two O.S.S. male agents heard the shot and come to see what happened, but Barbara plays a game of hide and seek, and manages to leave the ship without trouble.(13:40) Meanwhile, Maura passes the secret code to Alex, who knows the place is in Punta Carnero.Barbara drives a blue convertible to KH, chased by the two S.O.S. men in a car and, soon after, by S.O.S. men in a single engine airplane, from which S.O.S. fires a submachine gun on her. She stops her car on a beach, takes scuba gear from the car trunk, plunges strips to a bikini, and runs to the sea-shore. When the S.O.S. car reaches Barbara's abandoned car, she is already in the water, attired as a frog-woman.An S.O.S. man bids assistance from a team of S.O.S. frogmen with spear-guns who operate from a yellow mini submarine. Danger for Barbara is also present in the form of a shark, a giant streak fish, and other mean looking sea fauna. Barbara manages to hide from the frogmen - stopping to breathe for a while - and to destroy the yellow submarine with a time bomb, but she is knocked unconscious herself.Alex Dinamo watches the underwater blast from a speed boat in which he arrived just in time, piloted by Maura. Barbara tells Alex what she knows about the commando attack on the refineries, and he passes the information to headquarters, via his wrist-watch radio.Alex swims ashore and commandeers a Chevrolet truck with dairy milk on the road, promising the driver that he will return it later.(22:10) The nine S.O.S. commandos arrive in three rubber boats from an unseen ship, armed with submachine guns.
Maura shoots at them from the speedboat, and they return fire. Maura's gun stuck, the yacht's motor stuck, and Maura becomes a good target. The Commando Leader blows up the speedboat, but Maura was already swimming ashore.(26:20) Alex arrives with the truck on the beach, and engages the commandos in a submachine gun fight. Alex runs up a hill, and with a rocket launcher he makes a couple of killings more - four enemies down.Barbara arrives at the shore and throws two grenades to kill two commandos that were going around the hill to surprise Alex, but she is fatally wounded by one of the men. She manages to lift herself to her knees, but falls dead on the seashore.Maura picks a submachine gun from one of the commandos, and engages the last two in a close range gun fight, killing both - one of them being Barbara's killer. She is lightly wounded on her right upper arm. [Cut scene in the Italian version.]Alex is wounded by the Commando Leader with a glancing shot, but then he is able to take him by surprise. They fight with knives and hand-to-hand on the rocky beach.
In the end, he prevails with karate and judo. His foe picks up the discarded knife is going to throw it at Alex's chest, when the agent gets his hands on a submachine gun, and mows him down.The Police Inspector arrives with his men, and helps the secret agents to board the police cars, as two policemen in uniform carry the body of Barbara. [Cut scene in the Italian version.]MIAMI(42:50) Madame Solva calls a meeting of S.O.S. agents. She is mad for having lost her commandos, and says she is sure that one of three members of the organization is a traitor. Then invites them to a drink - served by the Professor at a nearby bar.
Only then does she explain that she's got a virus in a vial, able to contaminate water - and invites three agents to the adjoining bar: Agent 36, a man with blue eyes; Agent 143, a man with curly hair; Agent 380 [Agent 308 in the Italian dubbed version], a blonde in blue patterned mini dress. They drink glasses of water served by Professor Yura.Solva explains how the virus works, and shows the effects: the piranha fishes in the aquarium where she emptied the small vial are floating dead - and Agent 36 falls dead. Solva tells the others that now that the traitor is dead, there will be no more treason ahead. She blames the traitor for the failure of the mission in Ecuador.
S.O.S. may pollute the water supplies of any Latin American country, and it will become active in 48 hours - unless S.O.S. is paid for the antidote to be applied...PUNTA CARNERO, ECUADOR(47:40) Meanwhile, Alex Dinamo is at a spa in Punta Carnero, Ecuador, reading El Universo newspaper. He receives the visits of Maura and of the Police Inspector, but he is more interested in two sexy nurses that he hired to take care of him... a week after he'd received a clean bill of health. He also receives a letter, conveying him to depart to Puerto Rico in a haste. Maura seems to be jealous, and not trusting him that he is called to work...Alex finds that Maura is the passenger in the seat next to his, reading the magazine Vista. She tells him that she decided to take a holiday in Puerto Rico. But he does not notice that a woman in a summer frock, sitting two rows ahead of his, is looking attentively at them both.SAN JUAN, PUERTO RICO(51:50) As soon as they arrive at the luggage room at San Juan's airport, a redhead girl who saw them calls the information desk, asking them to call Alex Dinamo.
Alex Dinamo takes the call, and his given a rendez-vous at the Hotel San Juan.Regina receives a call from S.O.S. Agent 64 - a beautiful young woman who had traveled with Alex in the same flight - warning Regina, the S.O.S. Agent in Puerto Rico, that Alex has received a telephone call. Regina is going to investigate the calls, but she immediately calls Jack on the radio - by the code name Black Horse - who is living in a yacht with a black cat - and sends him to terminate Alex Dinamo. He says OK, and uses a machine on the deck to sharpen the edge side of his steel hand.By the hotel's swimming pool, a beautiful Woman in Red Bikini [played by Elsa Cárdenas], gives an order to a waiter. Jack is coming down the steps to the sunbathing area where Alex Dinamo is watching the many girls in bikinis around him. Maura taunts Alex in her patterned bikini. The waiter summoned by the woman in a red bikini brings a whiskey on the rocks to Alex - with a small disk on top. Alex takes it out of the glass, and for some reason decides not to drink.[Sudden cut to the hotel's casino. The woman in a red bikini is not seen again - either an Intelligence Agent or yet a double agent, possibly killed by Jack in a scene cut from both the Spanish and Italian language versions.]Solva is at the casino, wearing a red evening dress, sitting at a cards' table opposite a brunette Woman in a Yellow Dress. Solva stands, and leaves for the show room.Alex and Maura are at the roulette table, when a buxom Woman in Decoletee Dress approaches Alex, and plays - without sitting - 100 dollars at the 00. She loses, and leaves, telling him that there is a good singer at the show room. Alex leaves after her, but Maura - who was starting to win - follows him reluctantly.The Woman in Decoletee Dress goes to her white convertible car parked in front of the hotel, and is about to start the car when she is killed by a single chop of Jack's steel hand, who'd been hiding in the back seat.Jack cleans the blood off the golden hand before donning a large glove over it, and joining Solva at the show room - at a table some distance from Alex's. Solva is wearing a sleeveless red evening dress, and had been at the casino watching Alex.They're listening to the Singer - alias, S.O.S. Agent 380 - in a silver mini-dress, knee boots and... hat with ear flaps. A beautiful waitress calls Alex to the telephone, and he replies, «Thanks, beautiful!» But when he goes to the bar counter, it was only a way for the Singer to pass by him, already attired in a street suit, leaving him a message rolled in the cigarette butt she smashes on the ashtray in front of him.Alex was wise to the Singer's maneuver, and unrolls the message: «Blue car at three». Solva hails a Rochdale taxi cab, and follows Cristal.
Alex tries to discover who is the person following him, and goes outside, then he prepares a mini voice recorder with his own voice saying, «Stop! Don't move!». After a running chase down the rock bordering the beach, Alex reaches back to the machine rooms in the hotel's basement - which door was open ajar - followed by Jack. Placing the mini voice recorder away from him, and starting it by remote control, he disturbs Jack enough to knock him by surprise. Even so, Jack and Alex fight hand to hand - with Jack's steel hand breaking a water steam pipe. After knocking down Jack with an uppercut to the chin, Alex choses to leave him and recuperate his little voice recorder.(1:05:40) Solva's chase in the taxi ends not at a dead end, but at a straight alley when another car comes between the taxi and the fugitive.Meanwhile, Maura in a light yellow dress, red scarf around the bosom and triple pearl necklace, pays the bill and leaves the table, going to the ladies' room downstairs. She is followed by a female S.O.S. Agent 64 in a yellow mini dress and a double pearl necklace. She ambushes the attacker in the corridor, delivers a couple of karate chops dizzying her, but the girl kicks her away. Maura falls a couple of feet down the corridor, and the girl pulls a small pistol on Maura, who draws fast an evil smaller pistol disguised in her big hairdo. Maura shoots first, and the Agent 64 falls on her back, dying with a muffled scream, the hiked dress exposing her legs. Maura hurries up the stairs, and leaves, but misses Alex for a second.Alex boarded the blue car at 3 a.m. sharp outside the hotel main entrance. Maura calls a taxi to follow him, and another chase is on.The blue car driver is an Intelligence Agent, who takes Alex to the Singer, an undercover agent, and she tells him what she knows about the chemical attack in preparation, and the location of the laboratory. She says goodbye to him with a passionate kiss, and he leaves her at the airport. Maura pays the taxi, and goes immediately after Alex.Appearing from nowhere, Jack shoots the Driver and the Singer with shots to the head, killing both inside the blue car, as they were still parked to watch the departure of Alex's flight. Maura loses Alex again, and is told by an airport worker that it was «the flight 421 to Miami».MIAMI(1:10:50) At S.O.S. headquarters, Solva tells her three senior female agents - how the virus production is progressing. Natasha, Ingrid and Monique had been present at the airport wearing black, and are now in a variety of evening gowns, like Solva is. They question the leader about details of the operation.Aerial view of Miami, and close-up on Hotel Fontainebleau, and its swimming pool by the ocean. Solva meets again with her three of her agents, at one of the hotel rooms. From the balcony, they detect the presence of Alex Dinamo. While fondling her white poodle, she asks Monique «to take care of him». «It will be my pleasure,» the girl answers.The svelte brunette dons a white swimming cap over her shoulder length hair, to match her white bikini, and proceeds to attract Alex's attentions. She swims across pool towards him - with close-ups of underwater photography and subjective camera from Jack's point of view, in a glass window allowing for that sort of show for customers in a basement bar. Monique feigns a French accent, asks for a hand to hoist herself from the swimming pool, throws water upon his sports suit, feigns a torn ankle. Alex starts massaging the girl's alleged sprained ankle by the swimming pool.Maura tells him she didn't like being left alone at Puerto Rico, and the "French" Monique frees her hair to better entice the man. Maura turns her back and leaves in a rage. Monique finally asks Alex to help her walk to her hotel roomMeanwhile, Jack tells Solva that he is now going after Alex, but she changes her orders, and tells him «to take care of the girl», meaning Maura.After going up to her room, Maura stripped down to a bikini to pick a pair of binoculars and goes to the balcony window over the pool. Jack opens the door with a master-key, but only after turning the knob - enough to call Maura's attention. She waits behind the door, and attacks him with four karate chops to the neck that floor him, but he kicks her, then he knocks her out, and takes off the glove, to use the blunt side of his steel hand to deliver a fatal blow to her head. Through the door that he had left open ajar - a blonde in a black baby-doll - S.O.S. Agent 77 - shoots him in the back, dead. Maura wakes up - fresh - and meets the blonde, who leaves, saying just that she has information for Alex Dinamo.Meanwhile, Monique confesses the truth to Alex: she is not in pain, she just wanted his company. Before making love she wants to brush her hair, and from her hair comb she extracts a dagger with which to stab the agent in the neck. He was expecting an attack, dominates her, kisses her, and leaves her tied up and gagged in the bathroom.On an airport tarmac, Solva and a handful of agents, including armed commandos, watch as two light airplanes leave.Alex and S.O.S. Agent 77 are preparing to leave the hotel. Just in case, from his suitcase of equipment, he hands her a couple of smoke bombs.
They almost cross Solva her senior female agents - now attired in travelling clothes - at the hotel lobby. Just then, Solva inquires about Monique.
Natasha gets suspicious and follows the younger Blonde Agent... just in time to see her join Alex and S.O.S. Agent 77 leaving the hotel together in a blue Mercedes. She warns Solva via a radio hidden in their glasses: «77 has betrayed us.»Solva takes the call at Monique's room, just as another female agent is untying her. Solva immediately understands that Agent 77 is going to lead Alex to Yuma's laboratory. She puts her commandos in alert mode, and back-slaps Monique for her failure.Night has fallen. During the journey to the lab, Agent 77 tells Alex and Maura that she and her sister Barbara had infiltrated the S.O.S. under orders of the Intelligence Service.The two girls jump out of the car, armed with submachine guns, and Alex drives the car into the lab compound, attracting heavy submachine gun fire from the S.O.S. commandos. With their attention concentrated on him, and on blowing up the Mercedes, the two girls shoot down a number of guards from the darkness of the wood.Alex opens a door with a grenade, and he enters the lab, while the girls guard the door. Alex knocks out the scientist with the cross of the submachine gun, and prepares an injection of the virus that he injects on the man's neck. Without asking, Yuma opens the sealed room where the anti-virus is kept with the documents locating the contaminated waters. Alex knocks him out again, and leaves.The last guard was hidden, and fires at him; Alex kills the guard, but is wounded in the right thigh. He passes them to the girls, then blows up the lab - with Professor Yura inside.Solva sends a plane to pursue the three Intelligence agents across the Everglades, while Natasha and Ingrid go by jeep to the south sector, and Monique and her in two other jeeps to the north sector to cut out all escape routes. The speed run in the marshes using an air-boat ends quickly, because it had not much gasoline.From the air, S.O.S. Pilot locates the three fugitives. Agent 77 confirms that the documents are the real thing, but Alex is not able to call Intelligence headquarters via the radio in his wristwatch. The S.O.S. Pilot throws some grenades at the fugitives who run - Alex limping - away, with returning submachine gun fire.Solva and Monique's team happen to be in the fugitives way through the woods. Monique wounds Maura - who's wearing a black sweater and boots and a white skirt. The S.O.S. helicopter brings in a flame-thrower to burn the fugitives alive.(1:44:35) Alex ambushes and shoots Monique, while she was hiding between two trees and brushes, and then sends a grenade to finish her. Monique dies wearing a red sweater and a white skirt. Alex uses smoke grenades to create a diversion, and approach the helicopter, as Maura and Agent 77 keep holding their weapons and the box with the anti virus and the documents.(1:46:55) In a submachine gun duel at a short distance, Solva - wearing a white dress of military cut and a green sash hold by epaulets, and black boots - wounds the blonde Agent 77 - who's wearing the full black, figure hugging outfit of the male commandos. Alex shoots her immediately after, and Solva slumps back dead, he skirt exposing a bit of her legs.On board of the helicopter, Alex has some trouble to start the engine, but manages to do so before the surviving commandos stop him.
The International Service at last manages to contact Alex, who requires an ambulance at the airport, and complains about the shitty communication device he had been provided with. Then, he drops the wrist watch into the ocean.The antidote and the location map are handed over to the Intelligence Agent in Miami, and S.O.S. has lost again.Maura and former Agent 77 are recovering in hospital, while Alex is fighting against an old matron nurse who's imposing the non smoking law on him.

Title: Divlji andjeli
Synopsis: A group of juvenile delinquents are going to a coastal resort town after a succesful robbery.

Title: Unknown Woman
Synopsis: When an old lady dies two hours before her life insurance expires, the insurance' lawyer suspects something dubious. He begins to investigate and he becomes the lover of the old lady's daughter...

Title: Dark Story of a Sex Crime: Phantom Killer
Paulina Is Leaving
Synopsis: Paulina leaves the apartment where she lives with her two brothers. Her departure is marked by chaotic and sometimes violent confrontations. In a café, she meets a mysterious stranger who works in a nearby psychiatric clinic.

Title: The Big Dig
Synopsis: A slapstick comedy lampooning bureaucracy and the madness of everyday life in Israel centers on an escaped lunatic who digs up the streets of Tel-Aviv with a drill. A madman escapes from the asylum in Tel-Aviv, and starts digging a canal right in the middle of one of the main streets. Due to the bureaucratic mess in the city administration, not only does nobody try to stop him, he actually receives the help of the police, the city engineer, etc. The one city clerk who finds out what is really going on is, of course, declared insane...—Yuval Kfir <yuval@valor.com> A satirical story of a harmless man who steals construction equipment and begins to dig a deep canal in a main street of Tel Aviv, undisturbed by the residents or authorities. The canal is soon flooded with sea water and the event is celebrated by all.—Anonymous

Title: Decameron '69
Synopsis:
A series of several short films deal with sex, desire, loneliness and in one case, even murder:"Claudia"
A beautiful woman takes to spying on the windows of men who live in a tenement through a spy glass, silently sizing up which men are lonely and then selecting one to lavish with affection. Her current target is a poor soul that she meets and quickly marries. But it turns out that she is actually a black widow. The scenario ends with her scoping the tenement for her next victim."David"
A man and a woman build a relationship based mainly on sex. It is clear that the man is more into the relationship than the woman who looks sometimes uncomfortable and distant, probably because the man is more in love with his camera then with her. The indication is that the relationship ended after some time and that the man remembers and cherishes it more than the women ever did."Gyorgy"
A sculptor speaks on his passionate love for his chosen art form, even up to admitting that he finds the forms that he creates even more appealing than the real thing - from these sculpted works he sees the purest beauty in the world. But he is forced to confront notions of beauty in the world when he sees the death and degradation of his native France when it is taken over by The Nazis."Robert"
A timid young man sees the boredom and complacency in his own life, seeing the people around him as shallow and insignificant. But his mind keeps wandering back to one magical day on the beach long ago with two beautiful Swedish girls, where he regrets that he did not act on how he felt about them.The final segment features four damaged and lonely women from similar backgrounds who attempt to find some outlet via their sexual encounters:Adrian - A lonely housewife whose much older husband is too busy to meet her sexual needs. So, she finds her fulfillment in much younger men, mostly teenagers.
Roxanne - A girl from a poor neighborhood who has given to becoming a mistress wherein she gets everything that she wants, eve through it can't completely fulfill her needs.
Samantha Jane - An African-American prostitute since the age of nine who rose up from a life of dire poverty to sell her body for vast amounts of money. She claims to hate her clients.
Gloria - A self-hating lesbian who marks encounters with girls just as lost as she. Never romantic, only useful.

Title: Deiva Magan
Synopsis: The story is about a father and his sons--all three roles played by Sivaji Ganesan. One son who had disappeared shortly after his birth reappears, spends time with his father, and solves the remaining problem of the family. The father tells his wife he has the perfect gift for her birthday and presents the long-lost son. At the end the long-lost son tragically dies in front of his brother and parents after saving them from the Goons.

Title: Sara Akash
Synopsis: A collegian becomes embittered after being forced to marry. Agra-based collegian, Samar Thakur, lives in a joint family consisting of his dad, mom; brother Amar and his wife; as well as a married sister, Munni, who has been estranged from her husband. His parents force him to marry Prabha, who is a matriculate, much to his chagrin as this interferes with his future plans. The marriage does take place, and he soon finds that she is not only incompatible with him, but also not well versed in household chores - leading to arguments, abuse and neglect - and may result in the end of this marriage.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Beyond Love and Evil
Synopsis: Zenoff enters a heavily guarded country mansion. He finds a vast orgy occurring within, presided over by Yald, a debauched libertine seeking to orchestrate an atmosphere of unbridled sensual pleasure with no concessions to conventional morality. Zenoff is quite shocked, particularly when Yald announces he's about to be married and that he expects all his guests to have their way with his wife-to-be Xenia-who it just so happens is also Zenoff's true love.

Title: A Bullet for Rommel
Synopsis: During World War II, a tough officer organizes a commando raid into Germany.

Title: Ternos Caçadores
Synopsis: A family of four people (parents and two children, one of them still a kid) live by the sea. The father studies the migratory flights of birds. One day, there appears an escaped prisoner on the shore, trapped just like one of the lost birds. The film depicts their acquaintance and the ensuing tragedy.—Anonymous

Title: Sex Circus
Synopsis: A sadistic lion tamer recruits girls for a circus style nightclub.

Title: Besieged
Synopsis: A wealthy shipbuilding family falls apart in the wake of labor unrest and economic crisis.

Title: Pensiero d'amore
Synopsis: A young English peer leaves England and Thumbs his way across Europe. He sings in hotels and restaurants to make ends meet. When he becomes successful he also finds true love.

Title: The Invisible Woman
Synopsis: About the fading relationship between a professor and his wife. Based upon a short story by Alberto Moravia.

Title: Devil's Temple
Synopsis: An abandoned temple in the mountains outside of the old capital city of Kyoto is the scene of a fated meeting between a traveling priest, two women, and a vicious killer.

Title: El matrimonio es como el demonio
Synopsis: The story of a Playboy bachelor who does not know the good that is, until he is married. Slowly, the man discovers that having a woman is not easy, but sometimes being faithful is recommended.

Title: Il Prof. Dott. Guido Tersilli primario della Clinica Villa Celeste convenzionata con le mutue
Synopsis: Story of an ambitious young doctor through unethical means intend to make a quick career. Now is primary in a luxury clinic where administers the sick with the same cynicism of his young years.

Title: The Mummy and the Curse of the Jackals
Synopsis: A mummy battles a jackal-man in Las Vegas. An ancient Egyptian princess returns from the dead in the 1960's and puts a curse on an archaeologist, so that he can turn into a jackal-man and protect her, but her jealous husband returns in the form of a monstrous mummy to take her back and kill anyone that gets in his way.—metaluna zombie

Title: 3 in a Towel
Synopsis: Ladies man Romeo Bruno dallies with various attractive young gals on a lazy day in San Francisco.

Title: Sea of Blood
Synopsis: A revolutionary novel, film, and opera created in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) about the mass killings during the long period of the Japanese occupation of Korea. Based on a revolutionary play supposedly written by the Eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic, Kim Il-sung, and rumored to have been co-directed by the late, great Kim Jong-il . This revolutionary work is also popular among the Chinese, especially those who lived through the Cultural Revolution, and have fond memories of revolutionary antics.—Ulf Kjell Gür

Title: The Vampires
Synopsis: A wrestler (Mil Máscaras) tries to break up a covey of vampires, led by the King of Vampires (Carradine)

Title: Passion Fever
Synopsis: A young playboy goes around looking for women to score with. He finally meets one that he actually likes but will he be able to keep her? Yorgos, a handsome and self-assured young playboy in the prime of his life, is insatiable. When a beautiful woman catches his eye, he must have her, and chances are, they will end up in his apartment the same night. Then, Machi, a childhood friend from the old neighbourhood, enters the picture, and just like that, Yorgos falls hard for her, utterly unaware of her well-hidden secret. However, Dora, a love-smitten sixteen-year-old schoolgirl, is not willing to take this situation lying down. Has anyone ever escaped from the fever of passion?—Nick Riganas

Title: Adultery
Synopsis: Sex education film on the topic of adultery. Based on the magazine reports by Oswalt Kolle.

Title: Jahan Pyar Miley
Synopsis: Jahan Pyar Miley is an Emotional-Romantic Family Drama Film exceptionally crafted by Lekh Tandon. The Story revolves around the life of Vrajendra (played by Shashi Kapoor)- A Kind-Hearted MAn suffering from Amnesia and stays always confused about his identity family and his religion. However, he started worshipping all the religions and used the names - but the people started getting confused about his intentions, leading to consequences.

Title: El ojo de vidrio
Synopsis: Five one-eyed revolutionaries, notorious for their raids on rich people, plan an ingenious vengeance on the man who caused their disgrace. One-eyed revolutionary leader Porfirio Alcalá and his four cousins become notorious for raiding affluent landlords and ransacking federal ammunition, meanwhile participating in the Mexican Revolution. After many adventures, the five one-eyed revolutionaries plan vengeance on the man who caused their disgrace not before meeting two beautiful women and a talented theater actor who help them along their way.—V.Q.C.

Title: The Green Wall
Synopsis: A young couple forsakes their urban existence for life in the exciting but dangerous Peruvian jungle.

Title: Ek Shriman Ek Shrimati
Synopsis: Deepali is the only daughter of a wealthy but deceased industrialist, Lakhanpal. While on a holiday in Northern India, she meets with and gets friendly with Pritam. Unknown to her, Pritam has fallen head over heels in love with her, and wants to marry her. After Deepali returns home, Pritam follows her, meets with her maternal uncle, Choudhary, and creates a very good impression of himself. As a result, Choudhary is convinced that Pritam will make a good husband for Deepali. When Deepali finds out, she is enraged, as she has seen Pritam only as a friend, and her true love is another eligible young man by the name of Ajit, who Deepali has decided to make her life-partner, regardless of any and all consequences.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Snegurochka
Synopsis: A Russian fairy tale about a maiden named Snegurochka, who is made out of snow.

Title: Bridge Over the Elbe
Synopsis: Six U.S. soldiers are sent to destroy a bridge that spans the Elbe, which will somehow prevent the Soviets from occupying Germany in this fictional vehicle. End of World War II. The allies have reached the Rhine. The US command decided to blow up a bridge across the Elbe to prevent the Soviets to occupy Germany. Sergeant Richard was entrusted with this dangerous mission. He names five soldiers who will accompany him. During the night the commando parachuted near the bridge .—markyoloup

Title: The Guru
Synopsis: Tom Pickle, Britain's top pop artiste, travels to Bombay, India, in the 1960s to learn to play the sitar (musical instrument) from renowned maestro Ustad Zafar Khan. Tom is taken to Zafar's home, where he gets to meet his wife and several daughters, and the maestro himself.

Title: Anjaana
Synopsis: Raju lives with his widowed mother, Janki, in a small town and works as garage mechanic. One day he meets with wealthy Rachna Malhotra, and after a few misunderstandings, both fall in love with each other. When Rachna's guardian, Diwan Mahendranath, finds out he forbids Rachna to ever see Raju again, as well as goes to Raju's house and humiliates his mother, for he wants Rachna to marry his son, Ramesh. An enraged Raju wants to avenge this humiliation and decides to teach Mahendranath a lesson. He enlists the help of his maternal uncle, Chamanlal Kapoor, and together they succeed in fooling Mahendranath and making him give up all his money. But at the very last moment, Mahendranath finds out that he has been tricked, and together he and Ramesh conceive a plan that will bring Raju and his mother to their knees - a plan that will change their lives forever.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: A Wrong Way to Love
Synopsis: Anna, personal secretary of a wealthy industrialist, falls in love with her boss' daughter's leftist boyfriend Carlo and basically severs her ties with her boss (with whom she has also been intimate). After she moves in with college-student Carlo she attempts to provide for them both, but she can't find another job and sinks into the sleazy world of drugs and prostitution. Carlo's right-wing brother demands that Carlo return to the powerful businessman's daughter so he will have financial freedom for the rest of his life.—Ørnås

Title: La muñeca perversa
Synopsis: Rosi is a disturbed teen, the night after her grandmother's burial, Rosi begins to kill her whole family.

Title: Malkoçoglu Akincilar Geliyor
Synopsis: Byzantine Prince kidnaps a governor and plans to marry Serbian Princess to create a rift within Ottoman Empire. Malkocoglu is sent to save the governor and prevent the marriage.

Title: L'hiver
Synopsis: A film director gets frustrated in the middle of the preparation of a documentary about Bruges, while his actress wife is driven further and further away from him.

Title: Jigri Dost
Synopsis: Advocate Narayan Das lives a comfortable lifestyle in rural India with his wife, Annapurna, who insists on feeding everyone who is hungry; and a lovely daughter, Shobha. Since Shobha is of marriageable age, he has arranged to get her married to Advocate Anand and shows his photograph to her, and she shyly approves. The young man shows up, and to the family's delight, not only is he well versed in Law but also in dairy farming. Both Anand and Shobha fall in love with each other, and want to get married. They already have the blessings of Annapurna and Narayandas. Then one day while at a picnic, Anand excuses himself from Shobha's company as he wants to meet a friend. Shobha secretly follows him and is shocked to see him in the arms of another woman, Indu, who is the only daughter of wealthy Chairman Neelkanth. Watch what happens when Shobha confronts Anand with her knowledge and asks him why he has been two-timing her.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Winter Wind
Synopsis: The preparation, in Hungary, of the assassination in Marseilles of King Alexander of Yugoslavia in 1934.

Title: Dirty Angels
Synopsis: Years after getting away with murder, the three young perpetrators from Milan suddenly receive an incriminating photo, accompanied by a request for money. Despite their quick payment, they keep getting new messages.

Title: Las golfas
Synopsis: La prostituta Diana es echada del cabaret de donde trabaja y Luis la aloja sin ningún interés. Luis es introducido en el tráfico de drogas que encabeza Emiliano, quien pretende a Diana. Ambos tratan de escapar, pero los problemas los siguen a donde vayan.

Title: Twenty-Four Hours of Pleasure
Synopsis: Man develops a reputation as a great bedroom athlete after publishing a 'spicy' novel.

Title: Madame Death
Synopsis: A mad scientist teams with an evil, disfigured woman to kidnap and operate on young women to make her look beautiful again.

Title: New Underground History of Japanese Violence: Vengeance Demon
Synopsis: A young brother and sister live an ostracized life in rural 20th century Japan. Their family had been cast out from the village because their parents suffered from tuberculosis. And the rest of the townsfolk believed that tuberculosis was a genetic disease which gave the town a bad reputation. One day the town "leader" convinces the rest of the peasants to kill the two brothers in order to acquire their land and share it among them. The two brothers are attacked and the boy is tortured and left for dead, while the sister is raped by all the men in the village. As a result from the trauma, she loses her sanity. The boy survives the tortures and the beatings and decides to take revenge, killing all the adult inhabitants from the village. During the killings the viewer gets to realize that most of the town's inhabitants are corrupt and filled with vices, while they hypocritically spent many years accusing the two brothers of committing the acts of sin and debauchery they themselves practiced. Later the sister, in an act of desperation, commits suicide. Which further damages her brother's sanity and his decision to punish all the townsfolk and finally retire from the society which unjustly punished and hurt the two youngsters.

Title: Bog je umro uzalud
Synopsis: A trademark comedy by well known Yugoslav writer Radivoje 'Lola' Djukic. Nenad and Predrag are twin brothers. Nenad is the poor carpenter who works in the factory with deep financial problems, and he is one of the union leaders. On the other hand, his twin brother Predrag is the successful executive of a large socialist company, and he enjoys all the benefits of his position. As Predrag's company refuses to give a loan to Nenad's factory, Nenad decides to kidnap his twin brother with his union mates and to take his place in order to get the credit. But in the process, their plan has been unexpectedly changed.—Marko

Title: Hullumeelsus
Synopsis: A Gestapo officer must find an enemy agent from the asylum. The action takes place in a nameless country occupied by the German army at the time of World War II. In a small village there's an asylum. A squad of German soldiers arrives to take the insane people to a "walk in the forest". Just before they are ready to go to forest to kill the insane people, a Gestapo officer arrives and from his conversation with the doctor we can find out that there's an enemy agent hiding himself in the asylum. Officer Windisch must find the agent from 583 people and on his searches he is slowly starting to feel himself crazy too.—Anonymous

Title: Paris Does Not Exist
Synopsis: An artist attending a party smokes some dope and develops the ability to see into the future and the past. His psychedelic hallucinations increase with time.

Title: Crime Thief
Synopsis: Married with two young children, Jean Girod, a "writer", partly escapes that family life when he secretly witnesses a young woman commit suicide. In that new other life, he rents a room through his abstract artist friend Tian, there where he takes refuge. Through delusion or psychopathy, Jean begins to pedal the notion that he killed the woman, taunting the police through open anonymous letters to the media stating that he knows who killed her. He seemingly is either trying to push the theory as far as he can without getting caught, or truly does want to be caught as the killer despite not having done it. In an encounter with Tian's friend Florinda, with who there is a seeming mutual attraction, Jean may divulge his true intent and from what mental illness he suffers.—Huggo Jean (Trintignant), a psychopath, casually witnesses a young woman's suicide. In his sick mind, he begins to be convinced he murdered her and starts sending letters to newspapers with details of his "murder", which eventually lead to the police actually searching for him. As he is about to be caught, he meets a young woman Florinda (Bolkan) and the idea of a real crime begins to shatter his disturbed mind.—fabreu

Title: Swedish Wife Exchange Club
Synopsis: The still young Marianne already lives in divorce from her boring, loveless husband, who also seems to have fallen asleep sexually in every respect.

Title: Nude in the Sand
Synopsis: When Alicia is left alone with her little son, she finds herself harassed by society. She travels to Panama, where she starts a chain of extortions from men she has first seduced.

Title: Naked Bullet
Synopsis: A yakuza flees from his boss with a young waitress and is tricked into returning to the fold. For his efforts, he is tortured and beaten, and she is raped and discarded like trash. Five years later, a similar scenario presents itself only this time, the ex- yakuza has learned from his mistake.

Title: Baby Vickie
Synopsis: After Vickie was raped, she left her parents and her husband and throws herself into various sexual adventures .

Title: Helga und die Männer - Die sexuelle Revolution
Synopsis: Helga wants to write a report on the student unrest for a magazine and sets out to South America to research purposes in order to get to know the Latin American situation on site. In Brazil she starts an affair with the interpreter Carlos.

Title: The Archangel
Synopsis: Furio Bertuccia, a corruptible lawyer who defends lost causes, is hired by the glamorous model Gloria Bianchi to defend her from the alleged murder of her lover.

Title: Chirag
Synopsis: Ajay Singh meets with pretty Asha Chibber, and is led to believe that she is wealthy. After a few misunderstandings, he does find out that she is from a poor family. Both do fall in love, and Ajay goes to meet with Asha's brother, Dr.O.P. Chibber, and his wife, Shanti. They are pleased with this alliance, and arrangements are made for Ajay's mom, Gayetridevi to visit them and approve of Asha, which is done. Subsequently, Ajay and Asha are married, and settle down. Asha is expected to give birth to a baby boy as a heir to the Singh family. Unfortunately, she is unable to do so, and even worse -loses her eye-sight and becomes dependent on Ajay. Frustrated at this, Gayetridevi decides to ask Asha to leave the house, and arranges a second marriage for Ajay, with results that will change the lives of everyone around them.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Vixen
Synopsis: Although not a pure yakuza film, it does have quite a few of the genre's elements and, more importantly, it truly gets inside the sociopathic soul that serves as fertile ground for the ever-burgeoning yakuza ranks.

Title: Shart
Synopsis: Raj likes to gamble and place bets about virtually anything, including befriend an attractive woman, Pinky, and pretending to her brother, while carrying on his romance with his sweetheart, Sapna Singh. The second time Raj sees Pinky is in a coffin being carried to her grave, while he consoles her dad, someone shoots him dead, leaving Raj to take the blame. The third time he sees Pinky singing and dancing at a New Year's Party; the 4th time he sees her posing in a photograph with Sapna; and the 5th time he is introduced to a very much alive Pinky by Sapna, where she refuses to recognize him, and shortly thereafter she is found dead in Sapna's house; and the 6th time both Sapna and he find her lifeless body hanging from the ceiling. As this mystery deepens, the Police want to question Raj about the two deaths - while Raj himself keeps on getting deeper and deeper in a mystery that may well end up taking his very own life.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: The Seven Red Berets
Synopsis: Seven mercenaries on a mission into Simba controlled Congo territory requisite with typical sterotypes. A small village garrison has been overrun by hostile Congolese troops. After loosing government soldiers and an essential document, Kaptain De Brand is ordered to get the secret document back. A task force of six men and a female doctor must fight their way through central Africa's swamps and deserts to free the soldiers, getting the document and revenge their fallen comrades.—Fauno

Title: Tunnel Under the World
Synopsis: An ordinary man in a small town one day realizes that he is living the same day over and over again.

Title: The Intruders
Synopsis: Head Ranger Matt Hammond (Ed Devereaux) and Flight Ranger Jerry King (Tony Bonner) dealing with two suspicious divers seeking permits to fish off the coasts of Waratah National Park. Their real motives, however, are more nefarious.

Title: Arthur? Arthur!
Synopsis: The inventor of sure-fire failures leads such an abysmal life that he creates a second identity that of a dashing, debonair womaniser.

Title: Nannha Farishta
Synopsis: Govind, Nazir and Joseph decide to give up the world of crime when a little girl enters their life. After killing her father, four hardened killer-bandits, Govind, Joseph and Nazir, take young Gita to their hideout. They take a liking to her, look after her, and even daringly and dramatically abduct her governess, Gauri, just to pacify her. The question remains how long will these killers continue to hold Gita and Gauri?—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Misdeal
Synopsis: A penniless pianist is being offered a strange but lucrative contract he can't refuse.

Title: The Best Damn Fiddler from Calabogie to Kaladar
Synopsis: A poor bush worker refuses to sacrifice his dignity to provide his family with a better life. Emery Prometer is an itinerant bush worker living in a logging community in a rural area of the Ottawa Valley. He doesn't make enough money to support his large family but he is too proud to except government handouts and thus his family must endure the hardships. Despite the isolation and deprivation, his family has nothing but compassion for his tough self-reliance and hard-drinking lifestyle. Eventually his oldest daughter Rosie decides she must break the cycle of poverty by leaving home, getting an education and then a job for a better future.—pr1mal_1

Title: L'opium et le bâton
Synopsis: An Algerian doctor decides to leave the troubles in Algiers and goes back to his hometown, a small village lost in the mountains. There, however, the situation is explosive as well, as the guerrilla is active and the French military has to keep a close watch on the locals.

Title: Bye bye, Barbara
Synopsis: A journalist meets a pretty, young woman in Biarritz and they fall in love with each other. Once they have returned to Paris the woman disappears mysteriously.

Title: Alerta, alta tensión
Synopsis: After a criminal gang kidnaps a scientist with valuable information about nuclear weapons, an undercover agent named Jorge Rubio tries to infiltrate this gang in order to deal with the situation. The gang, however, quickly unmasks Rubio and uses both brainwashing and torture techniques on him. They also create a clone of Rubio, thus setting up a show-down battle between the two look-alikes.—dinky-4 of Minneapolis

Title: Childish Things
Synopsis: Alcoholic ex-GI goes to work collecting debts for gangsters and committing various other crimes, then has a religious conversion and helps other alcoholics. Alcoholic ex-GI goes to work collecting debts for gangsters, commits various crimes, then has a religious conversion and helps other alcoholics.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: Ballad of Carl-Henning
Synopsis: The warmhearted but rather naive Carl Henning (Jesper Klein) is an 18 y.o. dairy apprentice. He takes the run after a nightly fight with his employer (John Wittig), and is soon introduced to society's darker sides.

Title: Think of a Number
Synopsis: The elusive bank teller Flemming gets into trouble when he is tempted by the ability to take some of the bank's money by the nose of a bank robber. Soon, Flemming is embroiled in a dangerous game that, in addition to the vengeful bank robber, also involves the police and a mysterious, beautiful woman.

Title: Meri Bhabhi
Synopsis: A simple-minded, yet loving young couple, Rajoo (Sunil Dutt), and his wife Maya, who allow their child to be adopted by Rajoo's sister-in-law/Bhabhi, Shanti (Kamini Kaushal). Shanti's child was still-born after an accident. But Shanti does not know this, and believes the child to be her own. She is misled and misguided by Gangajali (Lalita Pawar), and as a result Rajoo and Maya are humiliated, not allowed to come near the child, asked to leave the house, and ultimately are charged with kidnapping the child. Rafi's joyful song "Aaj mera haal na poocho..."; and Lata's lullaby "Sohya mera pyar aanchal me pehli bar...", are still popular on radio.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: The Gladiators
Synopsis: Some time in the future, East and West have stopped maintaining standing armies and nuclear weapons. Instead, to settle their differences they pit different teams of crack combat specialists against each other.

Title: Rzeczpospolita babska
Synopsis: After II WW, female demobilized soldiers come to a little town to settle down. The initial fierce competition between female and male group turns into cooperation, and the final result is surprising.

Title: Japan Organized Crime Boss
Synopsis: Coming out of jail and hoping for a quiet life, Yokohama yakuza has to take the lead of his gang after the death of his boss. His small group is is taken in a crossfire between a big yakuza group from Osaka at war with the Tokyo alliance for the control of the city. He tries to keep to the old yakuza code but he is no match for the new thugs who live and fight without honor.—J.L. Riviere <jeanluc_rv@hotmail.com>

Title: Strangers at Sunrise
Synopsis: In the Transvaal, in 1900, the British army condemns to death an American mining engineer for aiding and abetting the Boer enemy. The engineer escapes from custody and takes refuge at an isolated Boer farm. When three deserters from the British army arrive on the scene, the engineer takes steps to protect himself and the Boer family.—dinky-4 of Minneapolis

Title: How I Got My Mink
Synopsis: Rich and rebellious siblings Nick and Donna defy their affluent upbringing by moving out on their own and making an underground movie about the loose sexual mores of the 60's San Francisco youth scene. Donna conducts random interviews with people on the street and experiments with lesbianism while Philip participates in a threesome with two women he's filming.—Woodyanders

Title: Perlas ng silangan
Synopsis: The BIGGEST Fillpino motion picture ever produced. Set amidst the cultural splendor of a Herolo past.

Title: To Hex with Sex
Synopsis: Shy and awkward, Marvin Swift loses his job at an underwear factory and bungles lovemaking with his girl friend. He becomes locked in the boiler room of an apartment building, and there Lucibel, who says she is the devil, promises to grant him any wish. He becomes the head of a company that makes sex exploitation films. But he hasn't lost his awkwardness; he becomes excited by the simulated sex and stumbles over the equipment, wrecking the set and losing his actors and production crew. Marvin next wishes to become irresistibly attractive, and he agrees to give Lucibel, in return for granting his wish, exclusive rights to him for 6 months. He is overwhelmed by her demands upon him, and he finally trades his soul for everlasting youth--believing that his immortality will prevent her from collecting the debt. He begins to enjoy his newfound freedom and goes to a party where he is accosted at once by all the women in attendance. They follow him into the bedroom, shed their clothing, and begin to tear at his clothes.

Title: Headless
Synopsis: With its title taken from Georges Bataille's journal Acéphale (literally, a headless man, but figuratively expressing the need to go beyond rational ways of thinking), Deval's film is the most literary of the Zanzibar works. The film opens with an illustrative image: a head in the process of being shaved, in close up. This image is accompanied not by the sound of an electric razor but an electric saw, suggesting the need to achieve a tabula rasa by radical means. The story follows the adventures of a young man and his friends as they wander through a barely recognizable post-May 1968 Paris. In documenting the by-gone expressions and gestures of the '68 generation in France, Acéphale becomes something of an anthropological film that reveals the rites and beliefs of the ideological novitiates.—Harvard Film Archive

Title: Born Black
Synopsis: A wealthy German businessman has a one-night stand with a waitress who works in a jazz club and whose black boyfriend is a trumpet player in the club's band. The same night the businessman has his fling with the waitress, he goes home and has sex with his wife. Nine months later his wife has a baby--and the baby is black.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: Mafia Mob
Synopsis: In the 1930s, Italian immigrant from Sicily Frank Mannata, his brother Salvatore and sister Rosella run the Chicago Outfit for the mafia. The Italian-Irish O'Connor-Messina gang challenges them, which leads to a devastating gang war.

Title: The Lady from Constantinople
Synopsis: Merry hell breaks lose when half of Budapest invades the apartment of a lonely, old fashioned elderly lady who has decided to move.

Title: The Egborg Girl
Synopsis: Two namesake men become friends. One inherits his uncle's estate and is hired when visiting incognito. He asks his namesake to pretend to be the heir. They both fall for a woman there. Young and handsome John Soegaard, meets another John Soegaard, a merchant marine cook, on leave from a whaler. Bearers of the same name, they strike up a friendship and wind up on a large country estate where both are wooed by the caretaker's pretty daughter, who mistakes the young man for a field hand and the cook for the returned-from-abroad owner of the estate.

Title: The Mighty Gorga
Synopsis: A circus owner and a trapper trek into an African jungle to capture a giant gorilla for his circus. Circus owner Mark Remington is concerned that he is about to go bankrupt. On hearing of an overgrown gorilla (Gorga) in Africa, he travels there with the aim of capturing it to be used as an attraction in his circus. On arrival, the hunter who originally reported the gorilla is nowhere to be found, but his daughter, April says that he has been kidnapped. Together they set off in order to find both Gorga and her father. Meanwhile Morgan, a rival hunter, is also on their trail.

Title: La maestra inolvidable
Synopsis: A rural teacher try to improve the live of a small town with traditions

Title: Submission
Synopsis: A psycho sex-fiend keeps his infantile girlfriend Vicky in submission with candy bars, toys and, yes, hot wax. But when they plan on killing a wealthy lesbian, Vicky discovers she likes a woman's touch and plans a nasty surprise for her boneheaded boyfriend.—Amazon.com Vickie had the mind of a child in the body of a woman...Barry had the mind of an animal in the body of a man...together they created a reign of terror! Not since Bonnie and Clyde has there been such a couple. They thrived o the destruction of human souls.Barry bent Vickie to his will and forced her to do his bidding...until they meet Linda. She made Barry less of a man and Vickie more of a woman.Barry and Vickie came to their latest victim's home; the wealthy Linda Staples. Barry tries to seduce Linda, but fails. One evening while Linda is out, the unholy couple finds a film revealing Linda's past as a whore and a lesbian. Barry forces Vickie to seduce Linda. The two women become attracted to each other and trick Barry to his death.

Title: Twilight
Synopsis: An ailing Khmer prince falls in love with Maharani Maya of India, his guest. The government of Cambodia sent him a trained nurse named Sopheap, who served him with devotion. But the prince was totally unaware of the rumblings in her heart.

Title: The Miracle-Worker
Synopsis: When a great illusionist cancels his show, an impoverished fireworks maker must become a magician in less than three days, and spare his avaricious impresario cousin the embarrassment. Will he become a great miracle-worker? Facing imminent eviction, the brilliant yet impoverished fireworks maker, and a bit of a mad scientist, Filippos, summons up the courage to ask his avaricious impresario cousin, Renos, for a loan. When Amar, the great illusionist, cancels his show, Renos will have no other choice but to enlist the help of Filippos, in high hopes that he can become a magician in less than three days, and spare him the embarrassment. Now, the reputation of the nightclub owner, Sarantos, is hanging by a thread. Will Filippos become a great miracle-worker?—Nick Riganas

Title: The Screentest Girls
Synopsis: A day in the life of two aspiring actresses who answer an advertisement placed by an unscrupulous adult film producer who subjects them to a series of increasingly sordid screen tests.

Title: The Thief of Baghdad
Synopsis: After tyrannical Commander Jabbir kills his father, Mehmood, along with his brother, Mehboob; sister, Yasmin; friend, Badru, and others decide to become bandits and loot the rich. Mehmood, now known as Baghdad Ka Chor, falls in love with Shehzadi Rukhsana, who detests him, and sets out to hunt him down after she finds out that he has abducted her brother. She does locate her brother, finds out that Mehmood had actually rescued him from unknown assailants and falls in love instead. Their lives will soon be turned upside down when Mehboob decides to sexually molest Rukhsana; betrays Mehmood, has him arrested and sentenced to be hanged; while Commander Jabbir makes himself magically immortal and indestructible, takes over the kingdom, imprisons the emperor, the Shehzada, and abducts and holds Rukhsana in a secret location.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Thou-Vou Bald Agent, Operation Havoc
Synopsis: Thou-Vou and his new partner, MAP31, accept three imaginary tasks from a cunning director who is only interested in filming the unsuspecting duo for his upcoming movie feature. Will the agents manage to squeeze success out of failure? Thou-Vou has finished the secret agents school and is now working as "000" along with his partner "MAP31". When a film director accidentally sees how goofy these two are, he presents himself as a client, giving them three assignments. Of course, all three missions are totally fake; he just wants to film their efforts, and thus making the ultimate comedy.—Chris Makrozahopoulos <makzax@hotmail.com> Finally, after rigorous training and a bit of luck, the overzealous student of the renowned "James Bond" private eye academy, Thou-Vou, or better yet, Agent 000, manages to graduate. Unfortunately--business is slow, and as things don't go as planned--Thou-Vou teams up with the fellow graduate, MAP31, to start their own business, and before long, the famous director, Jimis Paloukas, assigns three imaginary tasks to the agency. However, unbeknownst to the unsuspecting operatives, the cunning filmmaker and his crew are only interested in capturing on film the bumbling duo's adventures, intent on using the hilarious raw material for his upcoming movie feature. Will the two agents manage to squeeze success out of failure?—Nick Riganas The inept secret agent Thou-Vou has finally graduated from a school of secret agents. He and his fellow agent MAP 31 partner up to open their own agency. They are hired by drama film director Tzimis Paloukas and the film production company "Ah Vah" (Greek term for "woe") to complete three missions for them. Paloukas is actually fully aware that the two agents are inept. He intends to secretly film them in action, in order to produce a comedy film. The "missions" are wild-goose chases, and excuses to film gags. The first mission involves searching for a hippie by the name of Roza Alimonou. Thou Vou instead locates a Romani woman, who is also named Roza. The misunderstanding causes fights and a near--riot in a Romani camp. The second mission has the agents enter a a catch wrestling match against wrestler Spazokefalos ("Headbreaker"). The third mission actually interrupts the filming process of one of Ah Vah's rival firms. Causing a fight between rival film-making crews.—dimadick

Title: The Hand
Synopsis: Screenwriter Philippe (Duchaussoy) imagines a crime committed by his wife Sylvie (Delon) and a mutual friend Pierre (Serre): a dead body is put in a trunk but the hand sticks out. Sylvie and Pierre begin to have an affair and things get very dangerous and the imaginary crime is on its way to becoming prophetic.—fabreu

Title: Raja Saab
Synopsis: Born and brought up in an orphanage, it has always been Rajoo's dream of becoming a wealthy man, particularly a Prince of any region. His dreams land him in trouble when he misbehaves with Rajkumari Poonam, and is expelled from the orphanage. He seeks works as a masseur and goes to work with Prince Pratap Singh, who hires him, is so happy with his work, that he would like him to impersonate him and thus fulfill his dream of becoming a Prince. The only problem is that he has to insult and humiliate Princess Poonam, the very woman with whom he had misbehaved, and has fallen head-over-heels in love with her. The question remains, will his love of becoming a Prince overcome his true love for Poonam? The song "Rajoo ka hai ek khwab, Rajoo raja raja saab, raaj hai na taaj hai, phir bhi main raaj saab" continues to be popular even today.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: El taxi de los conflictos
Synopsis: Taxi driver Tadeo is about to encounter a busy shift. Throughout the day heterogeneous characters get into his taxi and the most varied situations arise. One of them leaves a baby in the taxi and Tadeo must find out where the little one belongs. He tackles this daunting task while keeping in the back of his mind that at the end of the day he has an appointment with a mysterious woman who apparently needs to tell him something very important.—jsanchez

Title: Enas afragos Onasis
Synopsis: Fate has a habit of playing tricks, as an illustrious surname is the only thing a struggling accountant and the famous Greek billionaire,Aristotle Onassis, have in common. But, what happens when he learns that he has one month to live? Fate has a habit of playing cruel tricks, as an illustrious surname is the only thing Agisilaos Onassis--a struggling accountant in a tourist office--and the famous Greek billionaire and shipping tycoon,Aristotle Onassis, have in common. However, when a routine medical examination yields terrible results, things will take an unexpected turn, as the condemned employee will have to accept the irrefutable fact that he has one short month to live. Perhaps, now is Agisilaos' last chance to taste a slice of the good life, and to renounce his former lifestyle; but, sometimes, modern medicine can be utterly wrong. Is Agisilaos prepared for a slight change of plans?—Nick Riganas

Title: Destroy, She Said
Synopsis: Elizabeth Alione is sinking into a deep melancholy when she drags down the corridors, the park and the dining room of a hotel.

Title: The Madam
Synopsis: A young man on a motorcycle passes a pretty young girl on the road whose car has broken down. He stops and offers her a ride home, and she accepts. It turns out that she lives in a brothel run by her mother, and they offer the young man a job--to have sex with all of the hookers who live in the house.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: C'mon Baby Light My Fire
Synopsis: A pretty young anti-marijuana activist is kidnapped by a drug ring, which is determined to teach her a lesson by degrading and violating her in every way possible.

Title: Razor in the Flesh
Synopsis: A decadent hooker, her pimp and the bordello's gay cleaner fight over the gigolo's missing money, with the utmost mental cruelty.

Title: Pyar Hi Pyar
Synopsis:
In order to win the heart of the beautiful Kavita, Vijay Pratap decides to masquerades as a wealthy industrialist and does succeed in winning Kavita's heart but Kavita has another charming admirer, Satish Raj, whose way-ward behavior cannot be understand by Kavita. But when he finds out about Kavita and Vijay's love he trys to create misunderstandings between the two, and does succeed in doing so and the couple split. He also gets to know the truth about Vijay and will choose all out effort to expose him.—gavin (gunmasterM@hotmail.com) Young Vijay lives in an orphanage after being separated from his widowed mother, Laxmi. Years later Vijay has grown up and a wealthy man, Kailashnath Gupta, identifies him as his long-lost son and takes him home. Once there, Vijay decides to find employment as a police constable much to Kailashnath's displeasure. Amongst Vijay's first assignment is to locate a beautiful young woman, Kavita's, who he falls head-over-heels in love with, missing father. Vijay sets about to accomplish this task little knowing that a male named Satish has convinced Kailashnath that Vijay is not who he claims to be, and that Satish is Kailashnath's biological son.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com) Baby Vijay lives in an orphanage run by Savitri (Paro), after being abandoned there by her biological mother Yashoda (Sulochana Latkar). Yashoda was forced to do this since the man who married her in a temple, refused to acknowledge her as a wife.
At the orphanage, Vijay is cared for by a widowed mother, Laxmi (Sulochana Chatterjee). Many months later, a wealthy man, Kailashnath Gupta (Raj Mehra), identifies him as his lost son and takes him home. Kailashnath comes to the orphanage and tells Savitri that he is the man who married Yashoda, and then did not have the courage to accept her in front of his father. Savitri hands over the baby Vijay to Kailashnath.
After Kailashnath leaves, Savitri realizes that she handed over Laxmi's son to Kailashnath by mistake, and his real son is still at the orphanage.Years pass and Vijay (Dharmendra) grows up into a fine young man. He decides to find employment as a police constable much to Kailashnath's displeasure. He gets Rs 300 per month as salary, which embarrasses Kailashnath. Gogo 'RamMilan' (Mehmood) is Kailashnath's driver. Gogo loves Chham Chham (Helen), who is a rich socialite.
To impress her, Gogo acts like a rich businessman and Vijay helps him by posing as a driver. Chham Chaam is the daughter of trader Jatadhari (Dhumal). Dindayal (Madan Puri) also has his eyes on Chham Chham. When she brings Gogo home, Dindayal tries to convince Jatadhari that he looks like Kailashnath's driver and not his son. So Jatadhari insists that Gogo invite them to his house and introduce to his father.
Gogo blackmails all the house servants (who have misdeeds of their own) to serve him as Kailashnath's son for the time Jata and his daughter are at the house. Vijay pretends to be Gogo's dad to convince Jatadhari. They both carry out an expansive charade and convince Jatadhari, before Kailashnath arrives and unravels their game.Amongst Vijay's first assignment is to locate a beautiful young woman, Kavita's (Vyjayanthimala), who he falls head-over-heels in love with, missing father (missing for 2 yrs). Vijay's boss is Kewal Mehra (Krishan Dhawan).
Kavita finds out that her uncle Diwaan Saab (D.K. Sapru) had received a phone call a few days after her father's disappearance. A man named Ashok (Pran) threatened Diwan that Shyam Kumar (Manmohan) has the knowledge of what happened to Diwan's business partner and Step brother. Diwan promised to meet Ashok in Bombay. She feels that Diwan & Ashok conspired together to betray her father, and Shyam Kumar knows where her father is.
Kavita travels to Bombay and meets Diwan Saab, where Shyam Kumar is a regular visitor. When Vijay announces himself as the CID officer to Diwan, Diwan meets Ashok. Ashok says he only fears Shyam as he saw many things. Shyam is blackmailing Diwan and needs Rs 5000 to keep his mouth shut. It is revealed that Diwan and Ashok buried Kavita's father in the jungle, where Shyam took a photo of their dastardly act.Meanwhile Shyam also lusts after Kavita.
Vijay and Kavita start off on the wrong foot, when Kavita mistakes Vijay for Shyam and spends an entire day in picnic with him. Later, Vijay attends Kavita's birthday party and Kavita asks Shyam to teach Vijay a lesson, but Vijay easily defeats Shyam and makes a joke out of him. Kavita is mad with jealousy. She writes a love letter to Vijay inviting him to a lake, while planning with the boatman to drop Vijay in the middle of the lake, since she knows that Vijay doesn't know how to swim.
The boatman is good friends with Gogo and reveals Kavita's plan to him and the news reaches Vijay. Vijay sends the letter to Shyam Kumar and thus Kavita's joke is played out on Shyam. Shyam ends up in the water and this further infuriates Kavita.
Eventually Kavita falls for Vijay's charms and the 2 fall in love. Kavita tells Vijay how her father disappeared 2 yrs ago and only Shyam knows where he is. Kavita finds Vijay is a CID officer assigned to her father's case.Vijay asks Kavita to write a love letter to Shyam. Shyam agrees to divulge everything to Kavita and calls her for a meeting, alone. Ashok overhears this and decides to kill Shyam. He calls Diwan, but the call is received by Kavita. When Kavita goes to meet Shyam, she finds him dead.
Meanwhile Savirti runs into Kailashnath, but doesn't reveal the switch that happened several yrs ago. Kailashnath meets Kavita and wants to meet her parents for her wedding. Kavita says she only has an aunt, and her name is Yashoda. Even her husband left her and since then she stays with them. Kailashnath meets the aunt and figures out that it is his wife. Kailashnath begs her to come home to meet Vijay.Now Ashok starts calling Kailashnath, saying that his name is Satish Raj. Satish claims to be Kailashnath's son and says when Kailash came to the orphanage to pick his son, he was handed another kid by mistake. Kailash decides to confirm the truth with Savitri. Savitri admits her mistake.
Kailash goes home and tells the whole story to Yashoda. Kailash takes Yashoda to meet Satish Raj, their son. Kailash wants to stay together with Vijay, but this is not acceptable to Satish. When Vijay finds out, he reaches out to Satish. He brings Satish home and decides to leave himself.
It is revealed that Satish is not Kailashnath's son, but the real son of Savitri, who decided to insert Satish as Kailash's son to lay a claim to his wealth. Meanwhile, on the streets, Vijay runs into his real mother Laxmi, while saving her from a bunch of goons. Laxmi lives her son, Gogo. Gogo has a friend named Mehmood Ali (Mehmood Jr.).Yashoda introduces Kavita to her son Satish. But Kavita recognizes his voice as Ashok, the man she heard speaking on the phone with her uncle. The news reaches Vijay who is convinced that Satish and Ashok are the same guy. Vijay goes to meet Savitri, whose testimony was crucial to the whole issue. Savitri gets scared and calls Ashok to meet her, without knowing that Vijay was keeping an eye on her. Now it is confirmed that Savitri and Ashok know each other and are conspiring.
One day, Savitri runs into Yashoda at a doctor's clinic and follows her home. Meanwhile a blackmailer (Shatrughan Sinha) calls Satish and says that Shyam had left evidence with him with instructions to go to the police if he died. the Blackmailer wants a deal of Rs 1 Lakhs with Satish, in exchange for the evidence. Vijay was tapping Satish's phone and heard the entire conversation. Satish calls Diwan and asks him to go for the money delivery, since Vijay has his eyes on Satish. Vijay hears this alsoNow, Vijay and Kewal have captured the blackmailer and Kewal poses as the blackmailer in front of Diwan, when he comes for the drop. Diwan admits to killing Kavita's father and is arrested by Kewal's forces.
Meanwhile Gogo is talking to Yashoda and mentions how Satish came into the Kailashnath household, and became his son, displacing Vijay. and the whole thing was due to Savitri's mistake. Yashoda says that Vijay is her son, whom Kailashnath brought from the Orphanage and in reality Gogo is Kailashnath's real son. Satish and Savitri overhear the whole conversation and kidnap Yashoda. Gogo had gone to fetch Vijay. Muhammad Ali sees the kidnapping and alerts Gogo and Vijay.
Vijay attacks with Gogo, but Satish manages to overpower him. Satish starts a fire to kill everyone, but Vijay fights back and saves Yashoda and Gogo. The police arrives and arrests SatishKailashnath accepts both Vijay and Gogo as his sons.

Title: Ekaveera
Synopsis: The tragic story of two couples.

Title: Scarabea - wieviel Erde braucht der Mensch?
Synopsis: A Teutonic lecher on vacation has a wager with some local peasants that he can't make a walking circle from sunrise to sunset to secure some coveted land. The middle-aged businessman embarks on his journey only to be slowed down by the beautiful reporter Scarabea. With thoughts of drunkenness and sex on his warped mind, the man tries to circumnavigate the parcel of property. The story is a retelling of an ancient folk tale told by Tolstoy where the initial victim bets his soul to Satan against the land he desires.

Title: Miss and Mrs Sweden
Synopsis: To increase sales of the magazine Veckohatten, the management decides to invest heavily in the beauty contest Miss Sweden. A communist cell is planning to sabotage the competition, because it is sexist.

Title: How, When and with Whom
Synopsis: Paola, Marco, and Alberto: a love triangle between Turin and Argentina.

Title: Wild Wheels
Synopsis: A group of surfers use dune buggies to protect their beach from a gang of invading bikers.

Title: Juliette de Sade
Synopsis: Sade adaptation set in the late 1960s.

Title: Nateeja
Synopsis: Vinod was a bad man - so bad that he stole away the jewellery of his wife on the wedding night. Bindu thus deserted by her husband had to struggle hard till she learned whereabouts of her husband. Vinod was going to be released from the Central Jail. A day prior to his release Bindu the simple village maid reached the city and fell in to the hands of some ruffians connected with the gang of Vinod's boss, Ranjit. Before they could rape her, her brother Kishore who had quaralled with father and left home years back and Mehmood the orphan boy saved her from the clutches of goondas. Bindu recognised her brother and narrated the story of her woes. Kishore and Mehmood decided to deliver her husband to her provided that she acted on their advice. Bindu agreed and in a few days she was transformed into a absolutely modern girl. Vinod fell in love with her at first sight and showed intentions to marry her. At the nick time Raniit revealed to him that Bindu was the same girl whom he married earlier. Vinod was moved over the devotion of Bindu. He even clashed with his Boss for her sake. Boss planned the murder of Kishore and Vinod was involved in it. He was sentenced for 7 years. While being transported to the central jail he escaped from Police and started his revenge on his Boss. Ranjit was exposed. In this episode Vinod met his lost brother who was a police inspector. Ultimately Vinod and Bindu united for ever.—jhingerraj

Title: I komissa tis fabrikas
Synopsis: A beautiful young woman is arrested by a wonderful policeman, due to her effort to steal letters from a gigolo's house. A brazen but ill-advised act of solidarity will pave the way for a fateful encounter, when an unexpected brush with the officer of the law, Christos Delimanis, almost sends straight to jail the innocent and beautiful burglar, Efi. However, who would have thought that, of all people, Efi--the pampered daughter of the Minister of Public Order and Citizen Protection--would be capable of theft? To help her get on the right track, Christos finds Efi a job at a yarn factory; but, does he know that he has already stolen the clumsy robber's heart?—Nick Riganas

Title: A Thousand Year-Old Fox
Synopsis: Once upon a time, under the reign of the three kingdoms, there was a woman who tempts a Buddhist priest named Cho. She is a one-thousand-year-old fox who intends to reincarnate as a human being. Not knowing this, Cho lives with the fox. But in the end, they get separated harboring sadness of unfulfilled love in this world.—KCCLA

Title: Katrina
Synopsis: Katrina and her son, Paul, look and live as white people but they are coloureds (mixed race in South Africa). Paul, blonde, who has just returned from England and has been offered a job as a doctor at Groote Schuur Hospital in Cape Town, does not know that he is coloured. A new pastor Alec Trevellan, arrives and falls in love with Katrina. He also has a dark secret from the past. Katrina's brother, Adam, warns both Katrina and Alec against getting married. He invites Alec to visit the village where Katrina was born.—Petr Vavruch, Cape Town, South Africa

Title: Career Bed
Synopsis: A mother is determined that her daughter will be a movie star, and will do anything--and have her daughter do anything--to make it happen.

Title: Murder Commited in a Sly and Cruel Manner and from Low Motives
Synopsis: Eminent Belgrade physician gets murdered. The investigation is revealing dark side of his character - illegal abortions and abuse of his wife. Wife's lover is becoming the prime suspect. The newspaper reporter, however, starts his own investigation. Besides being crime story, this movie in quasi-documentary fashion presents alternative cultural scene of Belgrade in late sixties.—Dragan Antulov <dragan.antulov@altbbs.fido.hr>

Title: A Candidate for a Killing
Synopsis: Nick Warfield is a speed boat racer hitching along the Mediterranean after his speed boat has been smashed up. He is picked up by Jacqueline Monnard who quickly gets him into a barroom brawl followed by prison.

Title: Quintana: Dead or Alive
