Synopsis: In a Mexican province oppressed by the evil Governor Don Juan de Leyra, the rebel-outlaw Quintana is the sole guardian of justice. Wearing a poncho and covering his face with a mask while on the warpath, Quintana is some kind of cross between Clint Eastwood and Zorro.

Title: Me enveneno de azules
Synopsis: 1969. Young Miguel returns to Madrid after spending two years in Paris. His brother Victor is completing the filming of a movie. His father is about to marry Marta, the former girlfriend of Miguel. The isolation that has gestated between them threatens to explode at any moment.—jsanchez

Title: Henry's Night In
Synopsis: A nerdy guy mixes up a magic formula and becomes invisible whenever he sneezes. He uses his power of invisibility to sneak into his neighbors' bedrooms at night when their husbands aren't home and have his way with them.

Title: The Freudian Thing
Synopsis: A photographer picks women up at the beach and invites them back to his house for photographs for a sizable sum. Little do they know what he has in store for him when he gets them home.

Title: Svetáci
Synopsis: Skopec, Prouza, Petrtýl are three country plasterers who are working on the renovation of houses in Prague. They are tempted by the Prague night life, but their first visit to the luxury Diplomat Grill doesn't go too well and in the end they have to escape. But they refuse to give up. They have superior suits made for themselves and pay for training in social graces from the former dance teacher Dvorský. When Dvorský decides that they are already sufficiently well educated, the men set off again for the Diplomat Grill. Here they meet three young girls. They have no suspicion that these are girls of rather easy virtue, who are looking for rich men in the Diplomat Grill with a view to fleecing them.—NFA.cz
A psychological drama of the illness of an individual and the illness of the society.

Title: Thanga Surangam
Synopsis: When Shivaji, a CID officer, learns about a gang of smugglers trying to sell fake gold bars in the market, he decides to catch them and free an alchemist who is in their captivity. Shivaji , a CID officer is on a mission to bust a gang that is flooding the market with fake gold bars. The gang which had abducted a brilliant scientist who is an expert in alchemy had not been getting his cooperation to perfect the fake gold bars. The scientist daughter , Bharathi unaware that her father is a captive with the gangsters is leading a happy , carefree life with the fat purse sent every month by the gang , supposedly from her father. Shivaji , during his investigation first suspects Bharathi to be part of the gang, but later finds out the truth and falls in love with her. But the gang abducts Bharathi also to force her father to cooperate. Shivaji trails the leads and lands in the gangster's den. There is a twist. His mother reveals that the leader of the gang is none other than his own father who deserted the family when Shivaji was a kid. Torn between duty to the country and his love for his mother, he decides to confront the gangster unarmed and gets shot by his father. Luckily he survives and the father repents and surrenders to the police. The scientist is released and Shivaji marries Bharathi.

Title: The Abnormal Female
Synopsis: A psychiatrist encourages his female patients to tell him their sexual problems, each as each relates her particular case, we see it in flashback. A psychiatrist encourages his female patients to tell him their sexual problems. We see each case in a flashback; Vickie is a sadistic dominatrix who likes to tie up her boyfriend and whip the crap out of him. Sherry is a married woman addicted to "dirty sex" with strangers she picks up for kicks. Kathy,Sherry's sister is a 15 yo nympho who just cant get enough. Married couple, Fred and Janet enjoy having threesome with lesbian Barbara and sometimes Diana to rekindle their marriage. Barabara starts to look for sexual need with other women when her businessman husband spares less and less time for her.

Title: Walk a Crooked Path
Synopsis: Psychological drama, set in a boys Boarding School, dealing with the after effects of a sexual harassment charge against one of the teachers.

Title: The Avenger, Zorro
Synopsis: The young Fred turns out to be a hindrance to Bill Warner and, as he did with his father, Bill will try to get rid of him to take over his ranch.

Title: The Girl Who Returned
Synopsis: Tough and exacting coach Geneva whips track star Lucy into shape for an upcoming Olympic event. Geneva's training proves to be so grueling that Lucy eventually runs away into an outside world full of apathy and hostility.

Title: Ljubav i poneka psovka
Synopsis: Dalmatia in the 1930s. Mate Pivac, a policeman and father of eight, finds out that the King himself becomes godfather to every ninth children in the country, and tries to make his wife sure that they need another child hoping for financial or any other kind of support. Eventually in the town arrives a circus troop, whose main star looks identically to Our Lady of the Angel. The attractive lady arouses male fantasies, so local women ask from Mate to make her leave the town by force. The trouble is that Mate himself is not immune to her beauty.

Title: Jyoti
Synopsis: Nirmal Mukerji, a young aero-mechanic, and his wife Radha are a happy couple the harmony of whose married life is some times affected by but one discordant note. While Radha is a deeply religions woman, Nirmal is an atheist. Despite her inherent goodness Radha is childless, and yearns for an offspring. Her unhappiness on this count causes a lot of concern to Nirmal. One day Preetam, Radha's brother known for his faith in Sadhus, persuades her to visit a holy man who predicts early motherhood for her. Nirmal who had reluctantly accompanied his wife on the mission scoffs at the prophecy and later takes her to a foreign-returned doctor for consultation. The doctor, after examining Radha, signals a ray of hope. She will not remain barren he asserts. After a while the dark clouds over Nirmals married life wither away and Radha is in the family way. She soon gives birth to a bonny boy who is named Nandan. To Nirmals utter horror, Radha is determined to bring up Nandan in the traditional way as she wants him to become a God-fearing man. As the child grows, the conflict between the parents widens. It has a bearing on the boys education too the problem of getting him admitted to a good school in Bombay is solved only when Preetam, the maternal uncle, comes to the rescue and "manages" to get through the admission bottleneck. Now Preetam a Bengali is attracted to a village belle from Andhra who knows only one language, her native Telugu, and whose father Gopalaswany can more than match Preetams fanaticism when it comes to parochial pride and prejudices. The tangle is finally solved in wedlock with love blossoming into an inter-provincial marriage with a touch of symbolic secularism all its own. Nirmal who has never approved of his wife's teachings to their son, has a strange eye-opener when he is caught in a test flight resulting in a plane crash and starts believing God.

Title: What Did Stalin Do to Women?
Synopsis: Two young Communist intellectuals, partisans of war, come to Rome, where they find protection of an important politician of the left.

Title: 2069 A.D.
Synopsis: A man is sent back in time through his past lives to realize how he had failed at love and what he can do about it.

Title: The Law of Violence
Synopsis: After spending five years in jail for a crime he did not commit, Jack Sparrow (Giorgio Cerioni) returns to the town of Red Rock seeking revenge.

Title: Don't Let the Angels Fall
Synopsis: The lives of a businessman and his family begin to spiral downward after he has an affair at an insurance convention. Robert, a Canadian businessman depressed by a sense of failure of his personal and professional lives, attends an insurance convention in the US and inevitably has an affair with a woman there. He returns to his family in Montreal; his cold marriage to his wife Barbara and two sons ages 19 and 13. His family life continues to disintegrate when his older son becomes romantically involved with a night-club singer who encourages him to participate in protests on his campus and his younger son, confused and insecure, skips school and dreams of running away. His wife is stuck in the middle; she suspects Robert had an affair and no longer feels adequate as a mother and wife. Robert continues to become more distant from his family and is increasingly distraught with his lack of ambition, wishing to do something that matters.—pr1mal_1

Title: Temptress of a Thousand Faces
Synopsis: A Hong Kong reporter (Tina Chin) sets out to thwart the evil "witch" boss of a gang (Pat Ting Hung) bent on world domination.

Title: Il suo nome è Donna Rosa
Synopsis: A widower tries to marry off his daughter to the countess' son in hopes of marrying a countess. However, the girl's falling in love with a boatman from Capri spoils the man's plans.

Title: Ansoo Ban Gaye Phool
Synopsis: Principal Vidyanand (Ashok Kumar) is a hardworking and diligent person. Due to his honesty, he gets in the wrong side of Seth Dharamdas (Raj Mehra), who conspires with Vidyanand's pupil, Shyam Rao (Anoop Kumar), and has him sent to prison. After Vidyanand serves his sentence, he has only one thing on his mind - to avenge his humiliation, and he will go to any extent to achieve this.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: I dannati della Terra
Synopsis: Upon his death, a young African director, Abramo Malonga, bequeathed his first and last unfinished film to his former teacher, the Italian director Fausto Morelli. Morelli, after having seen the work, is faced with a puzzling, complex and, in part, incomprehensible work. Helped by Abramo Malonga's young widow and by the notes left by his deceased friend, and again by his personal memories, the Italian director tries to reconstruct and complete the film. Fausto's work proceeds with difficulty, not only because of the problems that the film poses to him, but because of the problems that arise in his daily life. After a long crisis, after which he returns to Pisa with his old party mates and abandons himself to love and his own solitude, Fausto takes up the work of his African friend again, closing it with a last invention, in which, with daring metaphor, has refigured the human condition of our time.—Italia Cinéma

Title: A Woman Needs Loving
Synopsis: All could have gone smoothly if George, the man Jane, a beautiful library assistant, met in a park, had not been bitten by a dog. But the sight of blood spilling from the body of a man who attracts plunges the young woman into the vortex of a neurosis upsetting her sex life, leading her to a short encounter with lesbian love.—Anonymous

Title: Love Is Gay, Love Is Sad
Synopsis: Léon, a shy and dreamy tailor from the Faubourg Saint-Antoine works and lives in his apartment with his sister, Marie. Naive tailor Leon lives in a flat with his sister Marie, who he believes men are coming to see to have their palms read. Today he will discover that Marie is a sex worker, and her fiancé is actually her pimp. But on this same day, Marie saves Arlette from suicide and the shy Leon falls for her.—MUBI

Title: Ein dreifach Hoch dem Sanitätsgefreiten Neumann
Synopsis: Austria-Hungary, in the "good old days". Neumann, who was especially devoted to the female sex, was punished by his superiors in the provincial town of Krems.

Title: Puro siccome un angelo papà mi fece monaco... di Monza
Moina Moti
Synopsis: 'Moina Moti' is a beautiful depiction of true love. Moina is loved by two people: Moti and Mona. Mona loves Moina in an unrequited way. Poverty makes their life complicated and the story continues. Finally, Mona sacrifices his life, showing his deep love for Moina and helps to reunite Moina Moti.—humayunbuetian

Title: AC/DC
Synopsis: A woman gives up the love and protection of her older incestuous brother when she begins having a romantic affair with another woman, but the brother finds out and purposely begins a secret affair with the same woman. A woman gives up the love and protection of her churlish older brother, Buster, when she begins having a romantic affair with another woman. Buster finds out and begins a secret affair with the same woman just to spite his sister.—Anonymous What makes a girl finally give up the love and protection of her BIG BROTHER? Could the answer lay in the soft arms of another? Who is it, that SIS' sweetie really wants? Does her hairdresser know? Does big brother, or sis, know FOR SURE? The 'monkey" business really gets under way, when "Buster" gets eyes for Sissy's action, and decides to cut in. Sis, is unaware of the goings-on between her churlish, brother and unfaithful friend, until her simian pet Lamont, who is real clever, with a camera, reveals the whole sordid mess. Then, it's sis' turn to go APE, and try to turn the tables on her brother's guerrilla tactics. Thus, the confrontation and conflagration. But in the end, it's brother and the chick that swing together, leaving sis and her chimp to find new kicks in the jungle of desire.—pressbook synopsis

Title: Heintje: A Heart Goes on a Journey
Synopsis: The orphan boy Heintje lives with his aunt, who neglects him badly. He much prefers to be with the racing stable owner Teichmann and his horses. While Teichmann is in Switzerland, Heintje is put in a youth home by his aunt, but manages to escape secretly and makes his way to his fatherly friend. On the journey he melts all adult hearts with his singing, but there is still danger: a gang of smugglers abuses him as an unsuspecting courier, and Hanna, a woman from the youth welfare office, is supposed to ship him back to the home. Luckily, she turns out to be Teichmann's former girlfriend, with whom she promptly gets back together. Together they adopt Heintje.

Title: Die Nichten der Frau Oberst. 2. Teil - Mein Bett ist meine Burg
The Viking Who Became a Bigamist
Synopsis: The Italian Vittorio Coppa works as a sleeper car commuter and commutes regularly between Munich and Rome. Because he believes that true love exists only in connection with marriage, he is secretly married twice.

Title: Furnished Studio 2.P.
Synopsis: Two bank employees use a computer to determine the girls for their sexual affairs in their newly hired flat. Miguel Aguirrezabala and Ramón Fontecha are two employees of a bank in which a sophisticated computer system has just been installed. Neither short nor lazy, they decide to use it to improve their history of sexual conquests. To start, they rent an apartment, where they hope to consummate their plans. Their modus operandi is as follows: they introduce a series of variables related to the life of the target girl into the computer, and he returns one of three possibilities in response: yes, no or maybe. If affirmative or probable, they proceed to invent a story that attracts the said lady to the apartment. But things are not as easy as they seem .—Miguel Ángel Díaz González

Title: El curandero del pueblo
Synopsis: Machuchal, a rural healer, goes to nursing school. A rural healer uses ancient methods and herbs as cures, obtaining the confidence of the community for many years. When the government establishes a health center in the town, the people don't want to go there, preferring the healer's methods. Only after an emergency, in which a child almost dies, is the healer persuaded to attend nursing school.—Juana del Pueblo

Title: The Master Beater
Synopsis: Hawk, a brutal sadist, derives his pleasure from the pain and degradation he inflicts upon others. Skilled at exploiting human weakness, he forces men to sell their wives into white slavery for a bag full of a white, powdered drug. No woman can resist his overpowering evil. He inflicts the most terrible pain upon his slaves and leaves them begging for more. He takes the women he loves into his private world of tenderness and pain; but a violent death awaits those who incur his wrath.

Title: The Fiancee
Synopsis: Shekhar and Lalita love each other, but Shekhar's father brainwashes him to marry a rich woman. When Girin enters Lalita's life, Shekhar begins to feel insecure about Lalita's relationship with him.

Title: Brandy in the Wilderness
Synopsis: Autobiographical film, following a tumultuous year in the lives of Simon and Brandy, and the personal conflicts during the progress of their relationship.

Title: A Nest of Gentry
Synopsis: Lavretsky returns to his estate after stay in Paris.Frustrated with life,in his wife's unfair, he falls in love with Lisa. Suddenly the arriving of Fëdors woman which before has been reported the death, completes the simple love.

Title: Jazz All Around
Synopsis: Peter meets an old girlfriend Ellen. They agree that if they are still single a year later they will get back together. Shortly after he meets Vera. During a trip Vera's interest turns towards Leslie. Is it to late to get back with Ellen?

Title: I Want More
Synopsis: This lurid documentary offers a revealing expose of various deviant activities being practiced in that seething hotbed of sin and hedonism known as Los Angeles. Among the subjects shown herein are a young couple who are paid to have sex in front of leering voyeurs, a gang of rowdy bikers, a French artist who makes fancy designs out of women's pubic hair, a wild swinging Hollywood party, and an exclusive club of wealthy perverts.—Woodyanders

Title: Patsy, mi amor
Synopsis: Written by Nobel-prize winning Gabriel García Márquez when he wasn't famous yet, this is the story of Patsy, an overwhelmingly wealthy debutante with an acute sense of living and boundless curiosity. She falls in love with a man (Julio Alemán) whom is married and mediocre, and thus, learns the hard way about the unhappiness of mean people, marring her rose colored world.—Miguel Cane <Stepford@Yahoo.com>

Title: Opasnye gastroli
Synopsis: In Odessa, 1910, a group of revolution activists is hiding as a musical theater troupe.

Title: Love Me, Love My Wife
Synopsis: A woman offers her country home to friends to help them save their marriage, but her well-meaning gesture creates a new problem.

Title: At War as at War
Synopsis: To the young lieutenant Maleshkin the war is a minor obstacle, if compared to his personal battle to command his subordinates, while conducting an armored vehicle at the same time he's trying to impress his superior Soviet officers who put him under extreme pressures, one after the other, fighting the German forces occupying Ukraine during World War II. Here's the story of an impressionable man who learns in the hard way that being a leader is more than just using of his commanding voice to get what he wants.—Rodrigo Amaro

Title: Santo vs. Capulina
Synopsis: Capulina is a night-watchman in a warehouse, a perfect job for him. When some thieves break in and steal some crates, El Santo is after them because they are using the warehouse for diamond smuggling. Capulina hinders their capture. Then he decides that he will put on a wrestler's mask and help El Santo to capture the crooks.

Title: Staal Burger
Synopsis: During the 1960s the Afrikaans radio service of the South African Broadcasting Corporation presented a series on the adventures of a super secret agent, Staal Burger, a character created by the well-known SABC broadcaster Fanus Rautenbach. "STAAL BURGER" had an enormous following among listeners - the rich playboy with an eye for a pretty girl, his fast cars and his straight-punching way with the bad guys. Daan Retief, who played the role of Staal Burger in the radio series, reprises his role for the movie. He is assisted by Staal's sidekicks, Willem (Sarel Breed) and Dada (Miems de Bruyn).—mimosafilms.co.za

Title: God Chose Paris
Synopsis: This is NOT a documentary. It's much more. A very interesting mixture of filmed scenes with J-P Belmondo and archival footage regarding cultural aspects of all kind around Paris, starting at the end of the 19th century and ending in the mid-1960's. Jean-Paul Belmondo leads us through the movie starting as a young photographer around 1900, a reporter in both world-wars and doing fictional interviews with lots of celebrities. The film ends showing Belmondo as an old man around 90 years saying goodbye to his beloved Paris. A quiet but superb role for J-P B who can be seen in dozens of outfits and in different ages.—Belmondo-Collector

Title: Con licencia para matar
Synopsis: Four martial-artsy crime-fighting gals and their comic sidekick, under the leadership of a middle-aged guy in a business suit, defeat evil criminals.

Title: Czlowiek z M-3
Synopsis: Tomasz Piechocki is a young doctor who is looking for his own flat. And one day his dream comes true, he gets an assignment for an apartment. But to get it, he must first get married. Tomasz begins a frantic search for his wife. He has only 30 days for it. I do not want his friend to be indifferent to him. After the initial failures, he meets this one, the only one.—Producer

Title: Johnny Fears the Beast
Synopsis: A barber goes to Africa and becomes a wild animal hunter. After 20 years, he returns to Greece and finds that he has been cheated. Fed up with the hassle and bustle of the big city and the quirks of his customers, irritable, hot-headed barber Periklis decides to leave forever behind Athens and his one true love, beautiful Eleni. As Periklis makes it big in Africa as a big-game hunter, nostalgia starts to creep in, and without a second thought, he returns home in Greece, desirous of reuniting with his first cousin and former business partner, Anastasis. However, even though not much has changed, Periklis is in for a shock. What Anastasis has been up to all this time? Above all, will lonely Periklis get a second chance at love?—Nick Riganas

Title: La primera carga al machete
Synopsis: Both Spanish soldiers and Cuban peasants recall the bloody attack by machete-slicing Cubans in the late 19th century. The officers discuss the attack and the implications their defeat will have as they dread the review from Madrid. Soon Cuba would break away from Spain, largely with the help of William Randolph Hearst who helped to facilitate the Spanish-American War. The film also goes over the history, use and care of the machete, which came out of the sugar cane fields to become a deadly weapon of hand-to-hand combat.

Title: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven
Synopsis: Fred Leinster, an alcoholic ex-sheriff, is paid to collect a ransom for the kidnapping of a young boy. When he finds out the particulars of the crime he turns the tables on the outlaws.

Title: Ston daskalo mas... me agapi
Synopsis: An isolated village becomes the home of an idealist teacher who has his work cut out for him when he tries to inspire the fearful inhabitants to construct a road. Is the community's powerful landowner willing to cooperate? Deserted by immigration and nearly abandoned by the locals, an isolated village somewhere in the rugged and mountainous Greek province becomes the new home of an idealist young schoolteacher. Up against prejudice, superstition, and the sinister machinations of the community's powerful landowner and his ruthless son, the conscientious teacher will have his work cut out for him when he tries to inspire the fearful inhabitants to construct a road that provides access to the outside world. However, is the arrogant master willing to cooperate?—Nick Riganas

Title: Madhavi
Synopsis: Neighboring counties of Chola Naresh and Chola Chalukya are in a state of war, however, the might of the Chola Naresh overcomes that of Chalukya, captures Maharaja Rajendra Bhupathi, and his daughter, Madhavi, bind them in chains and bring them for justice before Maharaja of Naresh, who under advise from his Senapati, Jai Singh, decides to set the father and daughter free, and signs a peace treaty with them. It is now time for Madhavi to get married and a contest is arranged between Pratap Singh, Vikram Singh and Jai Singh. The winner is Jai, and a marriage date is fixed. Embittered that he did not win the contest, Vikram arranges for Madhavi's abduction, but instead Mangala, the adopted daughter of Maharaja Naresh is brought before him. In order to redeem himself in her father's eyes, he agrees to marry her. Soon the two marriages take place, and the two Maharajas announce that they will make Suraj the Crown Prince and go on a holy pilgrimage. The two women soon become pregnant and give births to two boys. Then Jai is sent to hunt down some wild animals. When he returns after a few weeks, nothing is the same anymore. Madhavi has been arrested for poisoning Suraj, and is held in a dark dungeon. When Jai fights for her, he is captured and blinded. Vikram takes over the throne, and tells Madhavi that she is to get married to him without 24 hours or he will kill her son. The question remains with no one to come to her aid, will Madhavi accede to Vikram's demands?—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Crows
Synopsis: A flat-broke aging boxer living on the verge of existence, associates with the equally desperate people in the city's suburbia to steal, cheat, and even kill for money.

Title: Shannon's Women
Synopsis: A budding adult film actress has an affair with her director, but finds that she is just one of his many shapely young conquests. She leaves him, and he realizes too late that he loved her.

Title: Plagio
Synopsis: A guy is brutally beaten but saved by Guido. They become friends. The two have a very solid relationship till they meet a girl they both like.

Title: Franco, Ciccio and Blackbeard the Pirate
Synopsis: Franco and Ciccio embark on a journey to find Pirate Flint's lost treasure, hunted by the fearsome Pirate Blackbeard. In 18th-century England, Franco works as a waiter in a tavern, unaware that he's a pirate's illegitimate son. Old corsair John recognizes him as the son he lost track of, and entrusts to him the map of a hidden treasure that also appeals to his enemy, Pirate Blackbeard. Ciccio is an unfortunate Capitan Black who tries to elevate his image as that of a great bloody killer. The two end up sailing together on a pirate ship and decide to follow the directions on the map to find the treasure of the notorious Pirate Flint. Ciccio then proposes to recruit a crew, but he doesn't realize that between the hubs and the people of the sea enters the dreaded pirate Blackbeard, who's seeking revenge because years ago he helped Flint ear the coveted treasure. After some adventures they finally meet Pirate Flint's ghost, who reveals the truth about the treasure.—Francesco Capussela

Title: Blue World
Synopsis: A young guy falls in love with a girl from a very rich family. Despite her father disapproval she agrees to marry him. But the young guy is arrested for stilling jewelry which cause more troubles for them.

Title: Weiße Haut auf schwarzem Markt
Synopsis: Oli sheikhs from the Orient crave new brothel girls and soon they arrange kidnappings of young women in Hamburg.

Title: The Gun Runner
Synopsis: Government agents hire a mercenary to infiltrate a crime ring that's selling guns to a right-wing militia in Texas.

Title: Der Porno-Graf von Schweden
Synopsis: German version of Pete Walker's "For Men Only" with extra footage directed by Günter Hendel.

Title: Len's Sonata
Synopsis: Simon, a painter, regains the use of his hands thanks to therapy administered by Ren. Later, when Simon is kidnapped by communists and forced to paint a portrait of Stalin, Ren again helps him by assisting in his escape. Simon's wife, however, is less than pleased at their growing friendship and becomes determined to keep them apart.—Anonymous

Title: The Bedroom
Synopsis: Until recently, Hannes was at sea, but sadness drives him back to St. Pauli, where he intends to retire. However, when one of his best friends gets into trouble, he must lend a helping hand.

Title: El-Hubb el-Kabir
Synopsis: A poor girl lives with her father who works as a photographer. The girl falls in love with a famous singer who has many relationships with women. The girl saves him from an inattentive husband who feels betrayed by his wife with him, and intends to kill them both after catching them red-handed, so she rushes to replace her in his hotel room, sacrificing her reputation for his sake. He loves her and becomes attached to her. She pretends to be a rich girl to impress him.—Anonymous

Title: ¡¡Se armó el belén!!
Synopsis: An old-fashion priest is sent to a Madrid church where the revolutionary air makes for a bad audience. His superiors demand that he updates his methods taking the example of a young priest at a modern church.

Title: The Invincible Fist
Synopsis: Here Lo Lieh (future international star of King Boxer) plays a dedicated chief constable for Tsang Chou village, who falls in love with the blind daughter of a bandit who is wreaking havoc.

Title: Ijô seiai kiroku: Harenchi
Synopsis: A Japanese woman is raped by her boyfriend day in day out.

Title: Do Bhai
Synopsis: The Bombay-based Verma family consists of two brothers, Ajay, and Vijay. Their family have been law-makers for generations, their grandfather was the District Magistrate, and their father was the Inspector General of Police. Now Ajay is a Judge, while Vijay is the Superintendent of Police. Both live a fairly harmonious and honest lifestyle, until Ajay hires a Secretary, Sandhya, who falls in love with Vijay. The brothers do not know that Sandhya has a hidden agenda that will pit both brothers against each other, and reveal one's hidden past.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Coup D'Etat
Synopsis: Italy, 1972. Political elections are taking place and Christian Democrat victory is expected; but the electronic computer of the Ministry of the Interior reveals that the party with the highest number is the Italian Communist Party.

Title: The Axe
Synopsis: A breathtaking story in which a woman goes in search of her husband A woman goes in search of her husband, who didn't show up home for several months. Her story is dramatic from the beginning until the end, as she goes through a series of events.—cormoranu

Title: Twelve Deadly Coins
Synopsis: An escort team was on a perilous journey to transport some gold. When they were ambushed by a gang of thieves and their gold shipment was robbed, a formidable student of the escort agency set off to the bandits' hideout.

Title: Tamanna
Synopsis: Suraj, son of Seth Dhanpatraj, falls in love with his college classmate Saroj, and the two decide to get married. Dhanpatraj does not approve of this marriage as he wants Suraj to get married to a rich and wealthy girl, while Saroj hails from a poor background. In order to marry Saroj, Suraj leaves his house. After a short span of time, Suraj turns to be a police inspector, while Saroj is practising medicine. Things go for a toss, when Suraj's step-sister comes up with various plans to have the entire property for herself. Will Suraj know about the plan of his step-sister? Will he be able to save the property of his family?—Movie Hub YT

Title: Detektive
Synopsis: Two amateur private detectives use unusual methods towards their clients.

Title: The Hungry Wolves
Synopsis: Memed is a fugitive with a sole purpose to find and execute bandits in the mountains. When a rich landowner wants to avenge the death of his father, he hires Memed as a bounty hunter. Memed is a fugitive with a sole purpose to find and execute bandits in the mountains. When a rich landowner wants to avenge the death of his father, he hires Memed as a bounty hunter. During his hunt, Memed saves a woman from the hands of bandits.—yusufpiskin

Title: The Dream of Hamish Mose
Synopsis: A lost team of Buffalo Soldiers and their Captain in the aftermath of the Civil War trek through the Texas desert on an odyssey to retrieve a comrade they had thought to have been dead.

Title: 6 Jahanam
Synopsis: When the 6 Evil Robber kill his wife, and a photo as the only lead, a merchant embarks a journey of revenge to find the 6 Evil Robber.

Title: Youth March
Synopsis: Ferrara, 1936-1941. Giordano and Mariuccia, brother and sister, form a consolidated trio of friends with Giulio. The first two belong to the agrarian middle class, while the third is of more humble origins. When Fascism raged with the proclamation of the Empire and the war of Spain, they were about twenty years old. Behind their apparent light-heartedness, there is a growing restlessness: Giordano, in contrast to his father, a convinced assertor of the regime, matures a convinced anti-fascist conscience, Giulio adheres to Fascism in an increasingly critical way and at the same time conceives an impossible love for Mariuccia. In the end the outbreak of the Second World War definitively divides the destinies of the three young people.—faumes

Title: Chanda Aur Bijli
Synopsis: A beautiful street dancer Bijli is in a gang of petty thieves. Sachin is the heir to a heritage household but due to the death of his parents lands up in a orphanage. In the orphanage when the children are ill -treated by the manager, his royal blood automatically singles him out to take cudgels for the rest of the children. He dares to challenge the Orphanage manager and is severely beaten and reprimanded. Meanwhile the servant woman (midwife) who had helped to deliver him, and who stole his mother's bangles and other proof of his royal lineage is on her death bed. She summons the orphanage manager and gives him the proof of Chanda's birth to atone for her sins before dyeing. But the orphanage manager plays mischief and along with the adopted son of the royal grandparents plans to eliminate Chanda. Chanda runs away and joins a petty thieves gang by chance, but is unable to adapt himself to their ways. Soon during a robbery escapade in his own home he ends up in his original house. There, through many twists and turns of destiny -he is able to contact his real grandparents, and also reform all the gang of small time thieves.—Mamta Dhody (Jabalpur)

Title: Delphine
Synopsis: Delphine is a country girl who travels to the big city in search of feminine emancipation and freedom. Attending wild parties and nightclubs, she meet a young rock star.

Title: The Battle of the Last Panzer
Synopsis: A group of German Tank Crew fight to survive in france while a french woman falls in love with the German lieutenant

Title: Algo amargo en la boca
Synopsis: A young man goes to a relative's house to celebrate Christmas, and finds that three female family members of different ages seek to advance their romantic attention.

Title: Little Jungle Boy
Synopsis: A boy who grew up in the Malayan jungle is brought into civilization by a husband-wife doctor team. The child finds his new surroundings disturbing and threatening.

Title: Atesli çingene
Synopsis: There is a tense love between Gelincik and Ali, who grow up together. Ali, who can't stand the coming and going of Gelincik, is about to leave the cergi, and he falls into prison because of Gelincik's slander.

Title: Trailer Camp Sex Ring
Synopsis: Vacation time at the trailer camp meant the chance for sexual deviation and perhaps some extra money. When Mr Dodge arrived it became a full scale business project.

Title: H2S
Synopsis: Surreal science-fiction fantasy about a student revolt at a futuristic University.

Title: The Genius
Synopsis: In an old abandoned church, a group of retired people meet, but because of the overload of the younger forces, the re-activated devils are in the process against their colleague, who cried over the fate of man. The dilapidated manor house in Dolní Krupa, remembering the times of Beethoven and his Moonlight Sonatas, now serves as a madhouse and an alcoholic sanatorium; they bring a woman who went crazy when she found out that the defendant had caused her husband to be unfaithful to another, while she, loving Beethoven's sonata, could not be seduced. The bitter irony is the presence of two geniuses: one wanted to make a man noble and human with music - and he lost, the other wanted the opposite - and he also lost. The evil became so great that he would cry over himself and see no other way out for himself than going to the opposite camp.—Anonymous

Title: An Unbelievable Fool
Synopsis: A silent remnant of WWII lies hidden in the backyard of an unsuspecting barber, as a former Gestapo officer and his henchmen, disguised as tourists, return to claim what's theirs. Will the resilient everyman find out their secret? At a peaceful neighbourhood in Plaka, a silent remnant of the blood-drenched German occupation in Greece during WWII lies hidden in the backyard of unsuspecting Thanassis, a struggling barber with a heart of gold. Secretly in love with his neighbour, Lisa, the beautiful daughter of the unscrupulous German collaborator, Charoupoglou, Thanassis' past will soon come back to haunt him when the unexpected visit of the former Gestapo officer, Major Von Ziffren and his henchmen, disguised as tourists, evoke bad memories. Now, decades later, the Germans are once again making demands. However, the resilient barber with the delicate hands refuses to yield to pressure. Will Thanassis ever find out rapacious Von Ziffren's secret, and will he get a second chance at love?—Nick Riganas

Title: Scratch Harry
Synopsis: A wife discovers that her husband is cheating on her. Enraged, she puts together a plan to take her revenge on him. What she doesn't know is that her husband has a similar plan in mind for her. What neither one of them knows is that someone else has the same plan for both of them.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: Jusqu'au coeur
Synopsis: An unemployed man with individualist and pacifist values is inevitably brainwashed by society and the mass media to conform to the dominant ideology and embrace war. His soul is destroyed but his heart cannot be conquered.

Title: Hang Your Hat on the Wind
Orestes
Synopsis: After the death of King Agamemnon by his wife Clitemnestra and her lover, Aegisthus, the young Orestes arrives in Mycenae with his friend Pilades to avenge the murder of his father. His sister Electra will help him in this mission.

Title: Our Lady of Compassion
Synopsis: Clown tells the story of João Grilo, a rich couple's lively employee who cheats everybody in town: arranges a funeral for a dog, bribes the priest and the bishop into celebrating a mass in latin for the animal, and performs many other bizarre things. After he dies, he's submitted to a trial in Heaven, being judged by a black Christ, having the Devil as prosecutor and the Virgin Mary as his defense.—<lukejoplin@infolink.com.br>

Title: Valparaiso My Love
Synopsis: A poor Valparaiso family faces a tough life after the father is sent to prison.

Title: La gran aventura
Synopsis: A humorous adventure story about two boys chasing after their dog who was kicked out of the church, and facing all kinds of, some real and some imagined, trouble, both for them and the dog.

Title: All About Women
Synopsis: Pascal and Martine are married, have children, but are getting bored with each other. Pascal is tempted by a beautiful salesgirl with whom he finally has a date. But the bombshell promised more than she actually delivers. On the other hand, he is attracted to his precocious niece Sophie. But he only becomes her confidant, living vicariously her first sentimental experiences with boys of her age. On her part, Martine winds up responding to the advances of her office manager who has been trying to pick her up for months. She follows him to his apartment but the alleged Don Juan is nothing but a boor who prefers to watch a soccer match rather than to make love to her. In frustration, she leaves him sprawled before his set while she returns to Pascal. They realize their extramarital experiences have reinforced their couple and can now live happily ever after.—Guy Bellinger

Title: The Wanton of Spain: La Celestina
Synopsis: In the last years of the Middle Ages, the Corpus Christi procession takes place in the Spanish city of Toledo. There, the young Calixto meets the beautiful lady Melibea, and he falls in love immediately, trying to court her, but getting only the rejection of the young woman. Determined to make her his mistress, Calixto chases her wherever she goes, thus causing "incidental" encounters. Then the lover decides to follow the advice of his servant Sempronius and go to an old bawd called Celestina, who, with the help of her evil arts and tips, bow down Melibea's will and causes tragic consequences for everyone.—jsanchez

Title: The Pleasure Machines
Synopsis: They could do anything people could. Only longer and better. Turn on your pleasure machine. We know where the switch is.

Title: The Promise
Synopsis: During the siege of Leningrad, Marat goes to the partly wrecked house of his parents, and finds Lika, a sixteen-year-old girl, who has sought shelter. They become friendly and fall in love, but are later joined by Leonidik, who is starving. They care for him, and shortly afterwards, Marak joins the Army, promising Lika that he will return. At the end of the war, Lika hasn't heard from Marat, except for a telegram on her birthday, and she now believes that he's dead, but he turns up suddenly. The situation becomes somewhat impossible, and Marat leaves. Leonidik and Lika marry, and thirteen years later, Marat again calls on them. Following a dramatic confrontation, Leonidik realizes that Loka's real love is Marat, and he gallantly walks out of their lives.—tonyman During the seige of Leningrad Marat goes to the partly wrecked home of his parents and there finds Lika, a sixteen year old girl who has sought shelter there. they become friendly and fall in love but are later joined by leonidik who is starving. they care for him and shortly afterwards Marak joins the army promising Lika that he will return. At the end of the war Lika hasn't heard from Marat except for a telegram on her birthday and she now believes that he's died but he turns up suddenly. The situation becomes somewhat impossible and Marat leaves. Leonidik and Lika marry and thirteen years later Marat again calls on them. Following a dramatic confrontation Leonidik realises that Loka's real love is foe Marat and he gallantly walks out of their lives

Title: Saturday October 5th
Synopsis: One day, Saturday October 5th, in a mans life.

Title: Children's Games
Synopsis: A young man is victimized and beaten down by society. Peter marries young but things go sour and he attempts suicide.

Title: Aadhar
Synopsis: Geeta young girl is cheated and divorced by her husband Raju, son of a wealthy father. In order to live with dignity and be independent, she comes to the city in search of a job. Being a beautiful girl, her neighbor Dinanath falls head over heels, this makes her uncomfortable and she so starts avoiding him. After sometime, Geeta meets a middle aged Barrister Prabhakar who starts falling for her. Prabhakar takes complete care of Geeta during the time of her illness and is attracted to her as she resembles his deceased wife Nirmala. Soon they get married. Soon trouble starts taking place in their love paradise when Dinanath Geeta's obsessed lover tries to avenge his love and tries to rapes her. Misunderstandings between Prabhakar and Geeta arises and he abandons her without knowing that she is pregnant with his baby. Will Prabhakar ever get to know the truth?

Title: L'amour
Synopsis: A young couple has just got married. He is an advertising artist in an agency on the Champs-Elysees. She is a window dresser in a department store on Boulevard Haussmann.

Title: Sedmina
Synopsis: The first days of war in Ljubljana. The young hero Niko experiences the bloody and violent transition from childhood to manhood. Based on the novel by Beno Zupancic.

Title: Pinagbuklod ng langit
Synopsis: The movie chronicles the lives of Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos and his family while in their Palace.

Title: Pensando a te
Synopsis: An Italian singer and his manager are preparing a tour in the States and are studying English. They both fall in love with their teacher.

Title: Paisa Ya Pyar
Synopsis: A wealthy and snobbish woman's life undergoes changes when her daughter marries a commoner. Bombay-based Lakshmi is the Chair of the Women's Syndicate as well as an aspiring politician, and lives a wealthy lifestyle along with her husband, Mohanlal; a pampered daughter, Shanti; and unemployed slacker son, Deepak. Mohanlal runs the 'Lakshmi Match Factory' and was born in a middle-classed background. Lakshmi hopes to get Shanti and Deepak married to a Rajkumar and Rajkumari respectively - but her hopes begin to fade when Shanti decides to marry an unemployed painting artist, Shekhar, the son of their factory watchman, Shankarlal. She then arranges Deepak's wedding with Dhanwati, the only child of a wealthy Singapore couple - little knowing the shock that await her when she will find out the background of her daughter-in-law.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Slucajni zivot
Synopsis: The two friends are trying to tear out their lives from the clutches of idle.

Title: The Haunted Castle
Synopsis: A young woman turns to the supernatural to wreak revenge on an murderous warlord.

Title: Tigress
Synopsis: Patricia has always been bullied, and her abusive alcoholic of a father was no help either. One night she is assaulted in her apartment but she doesn't see the face of her attacker. The police search for the scarred rapist, without success. After recovering, she enlists the help of a cop, a mafioso, and a drag queen to help her track down her rapist.

Title: Lisa dagli occhi blu
Synopsis: Mario, a young professor of nuclear physics, inflames a pupil of his. Unfortunately her father is in financial dire straits and the girl is about to marry a not very nice but very rich guy. Luckily enough her butler discovers a painting in the household by Michelangelo which will pay for everything.—Salvatore Santangelo <pappagone2@libero.it>

Title: Dead Body on Broadway
Synopsis: (1969) George Nader, Heinz Weiss, Heidy Bohlen. An FBI agent is killed by the mob after making off with five million in gold bars in a robbery gone bad. Agent Jerry Cotton is called in to bring the gang to justice and find out where his dead pal hid the missing gold. Color, 35mm.—Anonymous

Title: Smesný pán
Synopsis: Sixty-year old Professor Simek (Vladimír Smeral) is undergoing a serious heart operation. The surgeon Preclík is satisfied with the result, and after the successful operation he and his patient become famous. Simek is, however, indifferent to fame, since the years have robbed him of energy and taste for life. In the 1950s, during the campaign against supposed enemies of the communist regime, he was unjustly condemned to many years of imprisonment. His wife, daughter and friends have abandoned him, and his academic career was ruined. From the window of his hospital room it is only sick children that catch his melancholy eye, and a charming girl who releases carrier pigeons from a basket on the roof of the house opposite. One day she fails to appear on the roof. The professor is disturbed, sure that something must have happened to the girl. He goes out into the street in his hospital gown, even though he is well aware that too much strain could kill him.—NFA.cz

Title: The Fools, My Suitcase and I...
Synopsis: An optimistic man comes to Athens holding a suitcase with money to settle permanently in the capital. Soon, a group of people wants to steal his money. With his inconspicuous, well-worn leather suitcase crammed with 600,000 drachmas in crisp banknotes, Periklis Lianos leaves behind his sleepy village of Xirochori, desirous of creating a better future in bustling Athens. So, with this in mind, the unsophisticated, good-natured countryman heads to the faceless capital, unbeknownst to him that his precious cargo has already caught unwanted attention. And before long, poor Periklis starts crossing paths with sly opportunists, cunning tricksters, and seductive temptresses, all bent on rinsing him for every penny. Can the unworldly nobody get out of the tight spot and live out his dream in the big city?—Nick Riganas

Title: Zingara
Synopsis: Franco Sarresi is a young man from the province, who tries to achieve success.

Title: The Wedding Trip
Synopsis: The honeymoon.

Title: The Angel Was Born
Synopsis: Urtiga and Santamaria are two mean, sadistic and cold blood killers. Santamaria claims that he has seen an angel, and is very mystic. They escape from the police siege in a slum in a hill and hide in an isolated house. When the owner arrives with two friends, they kill the man and submit the two women to many humiliations, before killing them. While moving to another place, they leave a trail of blood, cowardly executing many persons.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

Title: Teen Bhubaner Parey
Synopsis: A street romeo stalks a girl, highly educated and above in social ladder. She falls in love, marries, and changes him, forcing him to study and leave his friends. He feels suffocated. He reaches top, and gets a chance to break free., Montu (Soumitra) is a factory worker, drunkard and street romeo with his gang of friends. A new girl Sarasi (Tanuja) moves in the colony with her family, brother, sister in law and mother. She is a post graduate and a teacher while Montu is only matriculate. Montu stalks her and eventually she gets fond of him, and then in love and marries against both the families wishes. They move to a new flat and there Sarasi takes into herself to change Montu, forcing him to restart his education and leave his earlier company. He does, but feels suffocated and lonely. Eventually he completes his doctorate and becomes a professor, but by then they have moved away from each other. A new girl, his ex student Heena (Sumita Sanyal) arrives, a billionaire's army contractor's daughter, with an offer of a job, in Army. But he had to relocate elsewhere, Sarasi can't leave her school job. It is on Montu now, take a new job, and probably Heena or stay back in his loveless marriage, just due to the gratitude?—S Basu

Title: Svoboda ili smart
Synopsis: In the short but heroic campaign the Bulgarian poet and revolutionary Hristo Botev leads a band of rebels from the Danube to the Balkan Range. 1876. A group of Bulgarian revolutionaries disguised as market gardeners are mingled with the cosmopolitan crowd on board the Austrian riverboat "Radetzki". They take over the ship and under the command of their leader Hristo Botev force the captain to take the boat to the Bulgarian shore. The passengers watch the rebels kneel and kiss their native land. After a series of battles with the Ottoman troops, they reach the Vratza part of the Balkan Range. The uprising for the liberation from Ottoman rule in the town of Vratza has already been put down. The people are scared and nobody will risk joining the band. The death of the young patriots is not seen as a mere tragedy, but as a tribute to those who have given their lives for the cause of freedom. Hristo Botev, the great poet and revolutionary, falls in the last battle...—Georgi Djulgerov <georgidjul1943@gmail.com>

Title: Marriage for Half an Hour
Synopsis: Fatma had a crush on Dr. Hosny, a womanizer dentist she met, so she decided to convince him to hire her as his nurse. On the other side, Hosny is in the middle of a love story with Dalia, a Flower Shop owner who hates liars more than anything else.—Khalid Saeiid

Title: Gisèle
Synopsis: The girl is very fascinating and unaware. The great tentacled city will give her unpredictable surprises and she won't be afraid to taste them day by day. Michel known for his sexual prowess hires a young girl, Gisèle to be his servant because she can make good coffee. She is raped by the man and soon becomes her willing sex slave. He slaps her around before making love, which is the only behavior she finds repugnant. She avenges his abusive behavior in a surprise ending.

Title: The Walls Have Eyes
Synopsis: The True Vue Motel is a rendezvous for couples looking for a few hours of "playtime." Unbeknownst to them, the motel's manager has hidden cameras in the rooms and films all of the encounters, then blackmails the victims.

Title: Erotic Center
Synopsis: One day, the young Biggy is found murdered in the Eros Center and anyone who was present on the spot that day is suspected of having committed the bloody murder.

Title: The Filth Shop
Synopsis: A crime syndicate abducts young women and forces them into pornography.

Title: Michael Kohlhaas
Synopsis:
Based on the short story by Heinrich von Kleist (1777-1811), this TV mini-series tells of a horse trader who is cheated out of a couple of black horses by crooked Junker Wenzel von Tronka (a small landlord) on the way to Dresden. When Kohlhaas puts his trust in the justice system and sues the Junker to return his horses, a relative of the Junker in Dresden uses his political influence to have the case thrown out. As a last attempt Kohlhaas' wife tries to convince the crooked Junker to pay retribution, but instead she is seriously injured and dies. The short story takes place in the time of Martin Luther, a time of serious social unrest among the country folks. So Kohlhaas has no great difficulties to incite some disgruntled locals to join him in a revenge attack on the Junker's castle. However, Tronka himself escapes. Excited by their success more farm hands join the search for Tronka's whereabouts, during which they commit several violent acts against innocent citizens. At last, the Kurfuerst (Elector) of Saxony sends troops to arrest Kohlhaas and his men, but they are defeated repeatedly. After a visit to Luther, Kohlhaas realizes that the acts of his group have gone out of proportion compared to the original injustice, many uninvolved people have lost property and even their lives. Though Luther condemns Kohlhaas' movement, he promises to intervene at the court of Saxony in his favor, and Kohlhaas agrees to appear in person if his men are given amnesty and he stays a free man until his case is tried. Even though Kohlhaas' case finds sympathies at the emperor's court, Tronka's friends in Dresden use some misunderstanding to subvert the amnesty agreement and have Kohlhaas arrested. The court finally sentences Tronka to make good Kohlhaas' damages, but on the other hand find Kohlhaas guilty of breaking the peace of the land and sentence him to death.—heiden98 Basierend auf die gleichnaminge Novelle von Heinrich von Kleist:
Der Pferdehändler Kohlhaas wird während einer Reise nach Leipzig auf Befehl des Junkers Tronka angehalten und gezwungen, seine besten Pferde als Pfand zurückzulassen. Als die Gerichte seine gerechtfertigten Ansprüche abweisen, greift er zur Selbstjustiz. Er brennt das Schloss des Junkers nieder und zieht raubend und mordend durchs Land, er wird zum Brandmörder.

Title: The Dependent
Synopsis: Fernandez is a lonely man leading a lonely life. All he does is work for an old man in a hardware store. But all that changes, when he meets the girl of his dreams...and her family.

Title: Explosion
Synopsis: During the height of the Vietnam war, a hippie and a draft dodger get together and hatch a plan to flee to Canada. They steal a car and head towards Vancouver, but the trip doesn't go as smoothly as they planned, and before long they're being chased by the police, accused of murdering several police officers.—frankfob2@yahoo.com

Title: Una horca para el Texano
Synopsis: Escalating tensions within a frontier town besieged by outlaws.

Title: La puerta y la mujer del carnicero
Synopsis: A movie divided in two segments, the first "la Puerta" (the Door) is about a high society gathering in which a door inside the mansion leads to a bizarre corridor where a menacing human figure appears. The second "la Mujer del carnicero" (the butcher's wife) is set during the mexican revolution and is about the guilt that a butcher felt after committing a crime.—jairhcastillo

Title: Vodka, Mr. Palmu
Synopsis: A TV reporter is murdered when he is eavesdropping on a secret Finnish-Soviet conference. The National Broadcasting Corporation enlists the help of police lieutenant Palmu, who comes out of retirement for this case. However, some have their doubts about the loyalities of Palmu, seeing that he was spotted in a diplomatic soiree in Moscow just a few weeks before the murder.—Jarkko Karhunen <moggie@iki.fi>

Title: Honor and Glory
Synopsis: It is the year 1647 and the war has been raging for almost thirty years. Poor and dilapidated is the stronghold of the knight Václav Rynda of Loucka (Rudolf Hrusínský) and so is his clothing. The family property was spent by his father who, after the loss at the battle at the White Mountain, was forced to give up his faith and had to swear submission to the Catholic Church to save his skin. Václav resembles a peasant rather than a nobleman, as he tries to find something to eat for himself and his domestics. One day, a visit comes to the stronghold. The emperor's commissioner Srandorf (Karel Höger) and his wife ask for a night's lodging. The guest then reveals to Rynda in private that Srandorf is not their real name and that in fact they are not even married - Jindrich Donovalský and his companion Katerina (Blanka Bohdanová) have come in the French king's employ and want to incite a revolt against the Hapsburgs in Bohemia.—NFA.cz

Title: Blue Demon y las invasoras
Synopsis: Blue Demon must battle against a group of alien women looking to kidnap men from planet earth.

Title: Super Colt 38
Synopsis: Billy Hayes, the marshal, discovers that the bandit whom he has been pursuing so long, and who has for months been torching his county, is none other than an old friend from childhood. Upon being confronted with the truth, the friend draws his gun, and Billy is forced to kill him in justifiable defense. Overwhelmed by guilt, he renounces his office and swears to never use arms again. He rides off toward the town where he and his old friend grew up together. Upon arriving there, he soon becomes involved in a dangerous situation, where Billy must decide whether he will fulfill his promise to keep away from arms, or intervene to save the honor of a woman and the life of an innocent man.—Anonymous

Title: Kamallata
Synopsis: Being an unwed mother, Kamal Lata had no option but to abort the child and move on with life. The man who left her comes back into her life, but she decides to stay in Vrindaban.

Title: Derevenskiy detektiv
Synopsis: Dervenskiy detektiv (1968) (aka...Rural detective) is based on the eponymous book by Vil Lipatov. About the detective Aniskin, who lives in the village, where everyone likes him. Derevenskiy detektiv (aka... Rural detective) is based on the eponymous book by Vil Lipatov. Detective Aniskin lives with his family in a rural village where people call him the "rural detective". Everyone in the village is respectful of Aniskin because of his wisdom and his good disposition. The villagers do not remember having any crime for many years. But one day an accordion is stolen from the manager of the local clubhouse. Detective Aniskin begins the investigation.—Steve Shelokhonov

Title: Weird Weirdo
Synopsis: When a boy is the victim of his over-protective mother, he leaves his home at night in search of female victims. When he meets a young girl who is a petty thief, he mistreats her and she falls in love with him.

Title: All Women Are Bad
Synopsis: A New York salesman goes on a self-destructive spree of sex after finding his wife cheating on him.

Title: A Woman's Case
Synopsis: A story of the influence of modern life on a woman, who meets a man in a sculptor's studio, has an affair, and is found dead.

Title: Leftovers from the North
Synopsis: Triangle comedy about a movie crew shooting a no-budget artsy film. Director Pohja is a clumsy beginner, cinematographer Törrönen an old pro, and the leading actors Igor and Merju first detest each other although the script is supposed to make them lovers. The two gradually grow closer even in real life, but the director too has set his eyepiece on Merju.—Markku Kuoppamäki

Title: Ich betone oben ohne - Das Go Go Girl vom Blow Up
El caballo Bayo
Synopsis: The story of the Mexican Revolution and a horse.

Title: Dr. Bezbarua
Synopsis: Dr. Bezbarua is a 1969 Assamese language thriller film, the first film of this genre in the language, directed by Brajen Barua and produced by Rangghar Cine Productions.

Title: Lyubit...
Synopsis: Several stories on the theme of love, between which are interviews people on the streets. The film ran into censorship difficulties because of its bleak view of love in the Soviet Union, and the director was only able to complete his preferred version in 1992.

Title: The Virgin's Bed
Synopsis: A loose Biblical allegory starring the legendary model-artist-musician Zouzou as Mary Magdalene, French actor Pierre Clémenti as Jesus and the director himself as a misguided apostle.
